GV01rv_hn09u:1: RV_9,001.01a svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā pavasva soma dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:3: RV_9,001.02a rakṣohā viśvacarṣaṇir abhi yonim ayohatam |
GV01rv_hn09u:7: RV_9,001.04a abhy arṣa mahānāṃ devānāṃ vītim andhasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:9: RV_9,001.05a tvām acchā carāmasi tad id arthaṃ dive-dive |
GV01rv_hn09u:11: RV_9,001.06a punāti te parisrutaṃ somaṃ sūryasya duhitā |
GV01rv_hn09u:13: RV_9,001.07a tam īm aṇvīḥ samarya ā gṛbhṇanti yoṣaṇo daśa |
GV01rv_hn09u:15: RV_9,001.08a tam īṃ hinvanty agruvo dhamanti bākuraṃ dṛtim |
GV01rv_hn09u:17: RV_9,001.09a abhīmam aghnyā uta śrīṇanti dhenavaḥ śiśum |
GV01rv_hn09u:19: RV_9,001.10a asyed indro madeṣv ā viśvā vṛtrāṇi jighnate |
GV01rv_hn09u:21: RV_9,002.01a pavasva devavīr ati pavitraṃ soma raṃhyā |
GV01rv_hn09u:23: RV_9,002.02a ā vacyasva mahi psaro vṛṣendo dyumnavattamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:25: RV_9,002.03a adhukṣata priyam madhu dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:27: RV_9,002.04a mahāntaṃ tvā mahīr anv āpo arṣanti sindhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:29: RV_9,002.05a samudro apsu māmṛje viṣṭambho dharuṇo divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:31: RV_9,002.06a acikradad vṛṣā harir mahān mitro na darśataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:33: RV_9,002.07a giras ta inda ojasā marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:35: RV_9,002.08a taṃ tvā madāya ghṛṣvaya u lokakṛtnum īmahe |
GV01rv_hn09u:37: RV_9,002.09a asmabhyam indav indrayur madhvaḥ pavasva dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:39: RV_9,002.10a goṣā indo nṛṣā asy aśvasā vājasā uta |
GV01rv_hn09u:41: RV_9,003.01a eṣa devo amartyaḥ parṇavīr iva dīyati |
GV01rv_hn09u:43: RV_9,003.02a eṣa devo vipā kṛto 'ti hvarāṃsi dhāvati |
GV01rv_hn09u:45: RV_9,003.03a eṣa devo vipanyubhiḥ pavamāna ṛtāyubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:47: RV_9,003.04a eṣa viśvāni vāryā śūro yann iva satvabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:49: RV_9,003.05a eṣa devo ratharyati pavamāno daśasyati |
GV01rv_hn09u:51: RV_9,003.06a eṣa viprair abhiṣṭuto 'po devo vi gāhate |
GV01rv_hn09u:53: RV_9,003.07a eṣa divaṃ vi dhāvati tiro rajāṃsi dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:55: RV_9,003.08a eṣa divaṃ vy āsarat tiro rajāṃsy aspṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:57: RV_9,003.09a eṣa pratnena janmanā devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:59: RV_9,003.10a eṣa u sya puruvrato jajñāno janayann iṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:61: RV_9,004.01a sanā ca soma jeṣi ca pavamāna mahi śravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:63: RV_9,004.02a sanā jyotiḥ sanā svar viśvā ca soma saubhagā |
GV01rv_hn09u:65: RV_9,004.03a sanā dakṣam uta kratum apa soma mṛdho jahi |
GV01rv_hn09u:67: RV_9,004.04a pavītāraḥ punītana somam indrāya pātave |
GV01rv_hn09u:69: RV_9,004.05a tvaṃ sūrye na ā bhaja tava kratvā tavotibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:71: RV_9,004.06a tava kratvā tavotibhir jyok paśyema sūryam |
GV01rv_hn09u:73: RV_9,004.07a abhy arṣa svāyudha soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim |
GV01rv_hn09u:75: RV_9,004.08a abhy arṣānapacyuto rayiṃ samatsu sāsahiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:77: RV_9,004.09a tvāṃ yajñair avīvṛdhan pavamāna vidharmaṇi |
GV01rv_hn09u:79: RV_9,004.10a rayiṃ naś citram aśvinam indo viśvāyum ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn09u:81: RV_9,005.01a samiddho viśvatas patiḥ pavamāno vi rājati |
GV01rv_hn09u:83: RV_9,005.02a tanūnapāt pavamānaḥ śṛṅge śiśāno arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:85: RV_9,005.03a īḷenyaḥ pavamāno rayir vi rājati dyumān |
GV01rv_hn09u:87: RV_9,005.04a barhiḥ prācīnam ojasā pavamāna stṛṇan hariḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:89: RV_9,005.05a ud ātair jihate bṛhad dvāro devīr hiraṇyayīḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:91: RV_9,005.06a suśilpe bṛhatī mahī pavamāno vṛṣaṇyati |
GV01rv_hn09u:93: RV_9,005.07a ubhā devā nṛcakṣasā hotārā daivyā huve |
GV01rv_hn09u:96: RV_9,005.08c imaṃ no yajñam ā gaman tisro devīḥ supeśasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:97: RV_9,005.09a tvaṣṭāram agrajāṃ gopām puroyāvānam ā huve |
GV01rv_hn09u:98: RV_9,005.09c indur indro vṛṣā hariḥ pavamānaḥ prajāpatiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:99: RV_9,005.10a vanaspatim pavamāna madhvā sam aṅgdhi dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:101: RV_9,005.11a viśve devāḥ svāhākṛtim pavamānasyā gata |
GV01rv_hn09u:102: RV_9,005.11c vāyur bṛhaspatiḥ sūryo 'gnir indraḥ sajoṣasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:103: RV_9,006.01a mandrayā soma dhārayā vṛṣā pavasva devayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:105: RV_9,006.02a abhi tyam madyam madam indav indra iti kṣara |
GV01rv_hn09u:107: RV_9,006.03a abhi tyam pūrvyam madaṃ suvāno arṣa pavitra ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:109: RV_9,006.04a anu drapsāsa indava āpo na pravatāsaran |
GV01rv_hn09u:111: RV_9,006.05a yam atyam iva vājinam mṛjanti yoṣaṇo daśa |
GV01rv_hn09u:113: RV_9,006.06a taṃ gobhir vṛṣaṇaṃ rasam madāya devavītaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:115: RV_9,006.07a devo devāya dhārayendrāya pavate sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:117: RV_9,006.08a ātmā yajñasya raṃhyā suṣvāṇaḥ pavate sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:119: RV_9,006.09a evā punāna indrayur madam madiṣṭha vītaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:121: RV_9,007.01a asṛgram indavaḥ pathā dharmann ṛtasya suśriyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:123: RV_9,007.02a pra dhārā madhvo agriyo mahīr apo vi gāhate |
GV01rv_hn09u:125: RV_9,007.03a pra yujo vāco agriyo vṛṣāva cakradad vane |
GV01rv_hn09u:127: RV_9,007.04a pari yat kāvyā kavir nṛmṇā vasāno arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:129: RV_9,007.05a pavamāno abhi spṛdho viśo rājeva sīdati |
GV01rv_hn09u:131: RV_9,007.06a avyo vāre pari priyo harir vaneṣu sīdati |
GV01rv_hn09u:133: RV_9,007.07a sa vāyum indram aśvinā sākam madena gacchati |
GV01rv_hn09u:135: RV_9,007.08a ā mitrāvaruṇā bhagam madhvaḥ pavanta ūrmayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:137: RV_9,007.09a asmabhyaṃ rodasī rayim madhvo vājasya sātaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:139: RV_9,008.01a ete somā abhi priyam indrasya kāmam akṣaran |
GV01rv_hn09u:141: RV_9,008.02a punānāsaś camūṣado gacchanto vāyum aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn09u:143: RV_9,008.03a indrasya soma rādhase punāno hārdi codaya |
GV01rv_hn09u:145: RV_9,008.04a mṛjanti tvā daśa kṣipo hinvanti sapta dhītayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:147: RV_9,008.05a devebhyas tvā madāya kaṃ sṛjānam ati meṣyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:149: RV_9,008.06a punānaḥ kalaśeṣv ā vastrāṇy aruṣo hariḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:151: RV_9,008.07a maghona ā pavasva no jahi viśvā apa dviṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:153: RV_9,008.08a vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pari srava dyumnam pṛthivyā adhi |
GV01rv_hn09u:154: RV_9,008.08c saho naḥ soma pṛtsu dhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:155: RV_9,008.09a nṛcakṣasaṃ tvā vayam indrapītaṃ svarvidam |
GV01rv_hn09u:157: RV_9,009.01a pari priyā divaḥ kavir vayāṃsi naptyor hitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:159: RV_9,009.02a pra-pra kṣayāya panyase janāya juṣṭo adruhe |
GV01rv_hn09u:161: RV_9,009.03a sa sūnur mātarā śucir jāto jāte arocayat |
GV01rv_hn09u:163: RV_9,009.04a sa sapta dhītibhir hito nadyo ajinvad adruhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:165: RV_9,009.05a tā abhi santam astṛtam mahe yuvānam ā dadhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:167: RV_9,009.06a abhi vahnir amartyaḥ sapta paśyati vāvahiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:169: RV_9,009.07a avā kalpeṣu naḥ pumas tamāṃsi soma yodhyā |
GV01rv_hn09u:171: RV_9,009.08a nū navyase navīyase sūktāya sādhayā pathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:173: RV_9,009.09a pavamāna mahi śravo gām aśvaṃ rāsi vīravat |
GV01rv_hn09u:175: RV_9,010.01a pra svānāso rathā ivārvanto na śravasyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:177: RV_9,010.02a hinvānāso rathā iva dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:179: RV_9,010.03a rājāno na praśastibhiḥ somāso gobhir añjate |
GV01rv_hn09u:181: RV_9,010.04a pari suvānāsa indavo madāya barhaṇā girā |
GV01rv_hn09u:183: RV_9,010.05a āpānāso vivasvato jananta uṣaso bhagam |
GV01rv_hn09u:185: RV_9,010.06a apa dvārā matīnām pratnā ṛṇvanti kāravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:189: RV_9,010.08a nābhā nābhiṃ na ā dade cakṣuś cit sūrye sacā |
GV01rv_hn09u:191: RV_9,010.09a abhi priyā divas padam adhvaryubhir guhā hitam |
GV01rv_hn09u:195: RV_9,011.02a abhi te madhunā payo 'tharvāṇo aśiśrayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:197: RV_9,011.03a sa naḥ pavasva śaṃ gave śaṃ janāya śam arvate |
GV01rv_hn09u:201: RV_9,011.05a hastacyutebhir adribhiḥ sutaṃ somam punītana |
GV01rv_hn09u:203: RV_9,011.06a namased upa sīdata dadhned abhi śrīṇītana |
GV01rv_hn09u:205: RV_9,011.07a amitrahā vicarṣaṇiḥ pavasva soma śaṃ gave |
GV01rv_hn09u:207: RV_9,011.08a indrāya soma pātave madāya pari ṣicyase |
GV01rv_hn09u:209: RV_9,011.09a pavamāna suvīryaṃ rayiṃ soma rirīhi naḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:211: RV_9,012.01a somā asṛgram indavaḥ sutā ṛtasya sādane |
GV01rv_hn09u:213: RV_9,012.02a abhi viprā anūṣata gāvo vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:215: RV_9,012.03a madacyut kṣeti sādane sindhor ūrmā vipaścit |
GV01rv_hn09u:217: RV_9,012.04a divo nābhā vicakṣaṇo 'vyo vāre mahīyate |
GV01rv_hn09u:219: RV_9,012.05a yaḥ somaḥ kalaśeṣv āṃ antaḥ pavitra āhitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:221: RV_9,012.06a pra vācam indur iṣyati samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi |
GV01rv_hn09u:223: RV_9,012.07a nityastotro vanaspatir dhīnām antaḥ sabardughaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:225: RV_9,012.08a abhi priyā divas padā somo hinvāno arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:227: RV_9,012.09a ā pavamāna dhāraya rayiṃ sahasravarcasam |
GV01rv_hn09u:229: RV_9,013.01a somaḥ punāno arṣati sahasradhāro atyaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:231: RV_9,013.02a pavamānam avasyavo vipram abhi pra gāyata |
GV01rv_hn09u:235: RV_9,013.04a uta no vājasātaye pavasva bṛhatīr iṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:237: RV_9,013.05a te naḥ sahasriṇaṃ rayim pavantām ā suvīryam |
GV01rv_hn09u:239: RV_9,013.06a atyā hiyānā na hetṛbhir asṛgraṃ vājasātaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:241: RV_9,013.07a vāśrā arṣantīndavo 'bhi vatsaṃ na dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:243: RV_9,013.08a juṣṭa indrāya matsaraḥ pavamāna kanikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:247: RV_9,014.01a pari prāsiṣyadat kaviḥ sindhor ūrmāv adhi śritaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:249: RV_9,014.02a girā yadī sabandhavaḥ pañca vrātā apasyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:251: RV_9,014.03a ād asya śuṣmiṇo rase viśve devā amatsata |
GV01rv_hn09u:253: RV_9,014.04a niriṇāno vi dhāvati jahac charyāṇi tānvā |
GV01rv_hn09u:255: RV_9,014.05a naptībhir yo vivasvataḥ śubhro na māmṛje yuvā |
GV01rv_hn09u:257: RV_9,014.06a ati śritī tiraścatā gavyā jigāty aṇvyā |
GV01rv_hn09u:259: RV_9,014.07a abhi kṣipaḥ sam agmata marjayantīr iṣas patim |
GV01rv_hn09u:261: RV_9,014.08a pari divyāni marmṛśad viśvāni soma pārthivā |
GV01rv_hn09u:263: RV_9,015.01a eṣa dhiyā yāty aṇvyā śūro rathebhir āśubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:265: RV_9,015.02a eṣa purū dhiyāyate bṛhate devatātaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:267: RV_9,015.03a eṣa hito vi nīyate 'ntaḥ śubhrāvatā pathā |
GV01rv_hn09u:269: RV_9,015.04a eṣa śṛṅgāṇi dodhuvac chiśīte yūthyo vṛṣā |
GV01rv_hn09u:271: RV_9,015.05a eṣa rukmibhir īyate vājī śubhrebhir aṃśubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:273: RV_9,015.06a eṣa vasūni pibdanā paruṣā yayivāṃ ati |
GV01rv_hn09u:275: RV_9,015.07a etam mṛjanti marjyam upa droṇeṣv āyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:277: RV_9,015.08a etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sapta dhītayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:279: RV_9,016.01a pra te sotāra oṇyo rasam madāya ghṛṣvaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:281: RV_9,016.02a kratvā dakṣasya rathyam apo vasānam andhasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:283: RV_9,016.03a anaptam apsu duṣṭaraṃ somam pavitra ā sṛja |
GV01rv_hn09u:285: RV_9,016.04a pra punānasya cetasā somaḥ pavitre arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:287: RV_9,016.05a pra tvā namobhir indava indra somā asṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:289: RV_9,016.06a punāno rūpe avyaye viśvā arṣann abhi śriyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:291: RV_9,016.07a divo na sānu pipyuṣī dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:293: RV_9,016.08a tvaṃ soma vipaścitaṃ tanā punāna āyuṣu |
GV01rv_hn09u:295: RV_9,017.01a pra nimneneva sindhavo ghnanto vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:297: RV_9,017.02a abhi suvānāsa indavo vṛṣṭayaḥ pṛthivīm iva |
GV01rv_hn09u:299: RV_9,017.03a atyūrmir matsaro madaḥ somaḥ pavitre arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:301: RV_9,017.04a ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pari ṣicyate |
GV01rv_hn09u:303: RV_9,017.05a ati trī soma rocanā rohan na bhrājase divam |
GV01rv_hn09u:305: RV_9,017.06a abhi viprā anūṣata mūrdhan yajñasya kāravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:307: RV_9,017.07a tam u tvā vājinaṃ naro dhībhir viprā avasyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:309: RV_9,017.08a madhor dhārām anu kṣara tīvraḥ sadhastham āsadaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:311: RV_9,018.01a pari suvāno giriṣṭhāḥ pavitre somo akṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:313: RV_9,018.02a tvaṃ vipras tvaṃ kavir madhu pra jātam andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:315: RV_9,018.03a tava viśve sajoṣaso devāsaḥ pītim āśata |
GV01rv_hn09u:317: RV_9,018.04a ā yo viśvāni vāryā vasūni hastayor dadhe |
GV01rv_hn09u:319: RV_9,018.05a ya ime rodasī mahī sam mātareva dohate |
GV01rv_hn09u:321: RV_9,018.06a pari yo rodasī ubhe sadyo vājebhir arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:323: RV_9,018.07a sa śuṣmī kalaśeṣv ā punāno acikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:325: RV_9,019.01a yat soma citram ukthyaṃ divyam pārthivaṃ vasu |
GV01rv_hn09u:326: RV_9,019.01c tan naḥ punāna ā bhara ||
GV01rv_hn09u:327: RV_9,019.02a yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svarpatī indraś ca soma gopatī |
GV01rv_hn09u:329: RV_9,019.03a vṛṣā punāna āyuṣu stanayann adhi barhiṣi |
GV01rv_hn09u:333: RV_9,019.05a kuvid vṛṣaṇyantībhyaḥ punāno garbham ādadhat |
GV01rv_hn09u:335: RV_9,019.06a upa śikṣāpatasthuṣo bhiyasam ā dhehi śatruṣu |
GV01rv_hn09u:337: RV_9,019.07a ni śatroḥ soma vṛṣṇyaṃ ni śuṣmaṃ ni vayas tira |
GV01rv_hn09u:338: RV_9,019.07c dūre vā sato anti vā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:339: RV_9,020.01a pra kavir devavītaye 'vyo vārebhir arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:341: RV_9,020.02a sa hi ṣmā jaritṛbhya ā vājaṃ gomantam invati |
GV01rv_hn09u:343: RV_9,020.03a pari viśvāni cetasā mṛśase pavase matī |
GV01rv_hn09u:344: RV_9,020.03c sa naḥ soma śravo vidaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:345: RV_9,020.04a abhy arṣa bṛhad yaśo maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ rayim |
GV01rv_hn09u:347: RV_9,020.05a tvaṃ rājeva suvrato giraḥ somā viveśitha |
GV01rv_hn09u:349: RV_9,020.06a sa vahnir apsu duṣṭaro mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:351: RV_9,020.07a krīḷur makho na maṃhayuḥ pavitraṃ soma gacchasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:353: RV_9,021.01a ete dhāvantīndavaḥ somā indrāya ghṛṣvayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:357: RV_9,021.03a vṛthā krīḷanta indavaḥ sadhastham abhy ekam it |
GV01rv_hn09u:359: RV_9,021.04a ete viśvāni vāryā pavamānāsa āśata |
GV01rv_hn09u:361: RV_9,021.05a āsmin piśaṅgam indavo dadhātā venam ādiśe |
GV01rv_hn09u:363: RV_9,021.06a ṛbhur na rathyaṃ navaṃ dadhātā ketam ādiśe |
GV01rv_hn09u:365: RV_9,021.07a eta u tye avīvaśan kāṣṭhāṃ vājino akrata |
GV01rv_hn09u:367: RV_9,022.01a ete somāsa āśavo rathā iva pra vājinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:369: RV_9,022.02a ete vātā ivoravaḥ parjanyasyeva vṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:371: RV_9,022.03a ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:373: RV_9,022.04a ete mṛṣṭā amartyāḥ sasṛvāṃso na śaśramuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:375: RV_9,022.05a ete pṛṣṭhāni rodasor viprayanto vy ānaśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:377: RV_9,022.06a tantuṃ tanvānam uttamam anu pravata āśata |
GV01rv_hn09u:379: RV_9,022.07a tvaṃ soma paṇibhya ā vasu gavyāni dhārayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:381: RV_9,023.01a somā asṛgram āśavo madhor madasya dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:383: RV_9,023.02a anu pratnāsa āyavaḥ padaṃ navīyo akramuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:385: RV_9,023.03a ā pavamāna no bharāryo adāśuṣo gayam |
GV01rv_hn09u:387: RV_9,023.04a abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam |
GV01rv_hn09u:389: RV_9,023.05a somo arṣati dharṇasir dadhāna indriyaṃ rasam |
GV01rv_hn09u:391: RV_9,023.06a indrāya soma pavase devebhyaḥ sadhamādyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:393: RV_9,023.07a asya pītvā madānām indro vṛtrāṇy aprati |
GV01rv_hn09u:395: RV_9,024.01a pra somāso adhanviṣuḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:397: RV_9,024.02a abhi gāvo adhanviṣur āpo na pravatā yatīḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:399: RV_9,024.03a pra pavamāna dhanvasi somendrāya pātave |
GV01rv_hn09u:401: RV_9,024.04a tvaṃ soma nṛmādanaḥ pavasva carṣaṇīsahe |
GV01rv_hn09u:403: RV_9,024.05a indo yad adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavitram paridhāvasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:407: RV_9,024.07a śuciḥ pāvaka ucyate somaḥ sutasya madhvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:409: RV_9,025.01a pavasva dakṣasādhano devebhyaḥ pītaye hare |
GV01rv_hn09u:411: RV_9,025.02a pavamāna dhiyā hito 'bhi yoniṃ kanikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:413: RV_9,025.03a saṃ devaiḥ śobhate vṛṣā kavir yonāv adhi priyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:415: RV_9,025.04a viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan punāno yāti haryataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:417: RV_9,025.05a aruṣo janayan giraḥ somaḥ pavata āyuṣak |
GV01rv_hn09u:419: RV_9,025.06a ā pavasva madintama pavitraṃ dhārayā kave |
GV01rv_hn09u:421: RV_9,026.01a tam amṛkṣanta vājinam upasthe aditer adhi |
GV01rv_hn09u:423: RV_9,026.02a taṃ gāvo abhy anūṣata sahasradhāram akṣitam |
GV01rv_hn09u:425: RV_9,026.03a taṃ vedhām medhayāhyan pavamānam adhi dyavi |
GV01rv_hn09u:427: RV_9,026.04a tam ahyan bhurijor dhiyā saṃvasānaṃ vivasvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:429: RV_9,026.05a taṃ sānāv adhi jāmayo hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:431: RV_9,026.06a taṃ tvā hinvanti vedhasaḥ pavamāna girāvṛdham |
GV01rv_hn09u:433: RV_9,027.01a eṣa kavir abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitre adhi tośate |
GV01rv_hn09u:435: RV_9,027.02a eṣa indrāya vāyave svarjit pari ṣicyate |
GV01rv_hn09u:437: RV_9,027.03a eṣa nṛbhir vi nīyate divo mūrdhā vṛṣā sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:439: RV_9,027.04a eṣa gavyur acikradat pavamāno hiraṇyayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:441: RV_9,027.05a eṣa sūryeṇa hāsate pavamāno adhi dyavi |
GV01rv_hn09u:443: RV_9,027.06a eṣa śuṣmy asiṣyadad antarikṣe vṛṣā hariḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:445: RV_9,028.01a eṣa vājī hito nṛbhir viśvavin manasas patiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:447: RV_9,028.02a eṣa pavitre akṣarat somo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:449: RV_9,028.03a eṣa devaḥ śubhāyate 'dhi yonāv amartyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:451: RV_9,028.04a eṣa vṛṣā kanikradad daśabhir jāmibhir yataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:453: RV_9,028.05a eṣa sūryam arocayat pavamāno vicarṣaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:455: RV_9,028.06a eṣa śuṣmy adābhyaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:457: RV_9,029.01a prāsya dhārā akṣaran vṛṣṇaḥ sutasyaujasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:459: RV_9,029.02a saptim mṛjanti vedhaso gṛṇantaḥ kāravo girā |
GV01rv_hn09u:461: RV_9,029.03a suṣahā soma tāni te punānāya prabhūvaso |
GV01rv_hn09u:463: RV_9,029.04a viśvā vasūni saṃjayan pavasva soma dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:465: RV_9,029.05a rakṣā su no araruṣaḥ svanāt samasya kasya cit |
GV01rv_hn09u:467: RV_9,029.06a endo pārthivaṃ rayiṃ divyam pavasva dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:469: RV_9,030.01a pra dhārā asya śuṣmiṇo vṛthā pavitre akṣaran |
GV01rv_hn09u:471: RV_9,030.02a indur hiyānaḥ sotṛbhir mṛjyamānaḥ kanikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:473: RV_9,030.03a ā naḥ śuṣmaṃ nṛṣāhyaṃ vīravantam puruspṛham |
GV01rv_hn09u:475: RV_9,030.04a pra somo ati dhārayā pavamāno asiṣyadat |
GV01rv_hn09u:477: RV_9,030.05a apsu tvā madhumattamaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:479: RV_9,030.06a sunotā madhumattamaṃ somam indrāya vajriṇe |
GV01rv_hn09u:481: RV_9,031.01a pra somāsaḥ svādhyaḥ pavamānāso akramuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:483: RV_9,031.02a divas pṛthivyā adhi bhavendo dyumnavardhanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:485: RV_9,031.03a tubhyaṃ vātā abhipriyas tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:487: RV_9,031.04a ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam |
GV01rv_hn09u:489: RV_9,031.05a tubhyaṃ gāvo ghṛtam payo babhro duduhre akṣitam |
GV01rv_hn09u:491: RV_9,031.06a svāyudhasya te sato bhuvanasya pate vayam |
GV01rv_hn09u:493: RV_9,032.01a pra somāso madacyutaḥ śravase no maghonaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:495: RV_9,032.02a ād īṃ tritasya yoṣaṇo hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:497: RV_9,032.03a ād īṃ haṃso yathā gaṇaṃ viśvasyāvīvaśan matim |
GV01rv_hn09u:499: RV_9,032.04a ubhe somāvacākaśan mṛgo na takto arṣasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:501: RV_9,032.05a abhi gāvo anūṣata yoṣā jāram iva priyam |
GV01rv_hn09u:503: RV_9,032.06a asme dhehi dyumad yaśo maghavadbhyaś ca mahyaṃ ca |
GV01rv_hn09u:505: RV_9,033.01a pra somāso vipaścito 'pāṃ na yanty ūrmayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:507: RV_9,033.02a abhi droṇāni babhravaḥ śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:509: RV_9,033.03a sutā indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:511: RV_9,033.04a tisro vāca ud īrate gāvo mimanti dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:513: RV_9,033.05a abhi brahmīr anūṣata yahvīr ṛtasya mātaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:515: RV_9,033.06a rāyaḥ samudrāṃś caturo 'smabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:517: RV_9,034.01a pra suvāno dhārayā tanendur hinvāno arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:519: RV_9,034.02a suta indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:521: RV_9,034.03a vṛṣāṇaṃ vṛṣabhir yataṃ sunvanti somam adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:523: RV_9,034.04a bhuvat tritasya marjyo bhuvad indrāya matsaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:525: RV_9,034.05a abhīm ṛtasya viṣṭapaṃ duhate pṛśnimātaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:527: RV_9,034.06a sam enam ahrutā imā giro arṣanti sasrutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:529: RV_9,035.01a ā naḥ pavasva dhārayā pavamāna rayim pṛthum |
GV01rv_hn09u:533: RV_9,035.03a tvayā vīreṇa vīravo 'bhi ṣyāma pṛtanyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:535: RV_9,035.04a pra vājam indur iṣyati siṣāsan vājasā ṛṣiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:537: RV_9,035.05a taṃ gīrbhir vācamīṅkhayam punānaṃ vāsayāmasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:539: RV_9,035.06a viśvo yasya vrate jano dādhāra dharmaṇas pateḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:541: RV_9,036.01a asarji rathyo yathā pavitre camvoḥ sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:543: RV_9,036.02a sa vahniḥ soma jāgṛviḥ pavasva devavīr ati |
GV01rv_hn09u:545: RV_9,036.03a sa no jyotīṃṣi pūrvya pavamāna vi rocaya |
GV01rv_hn09u:549: RV_9,036.05a sa viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somo divyāni pārthivā |
GV01rv_hn09u:551: RV_9,036.06a ā divas pṛṣṭham aśvayur gavyayuḥ soma rohasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:553: RV_9,037.01a sa sutaḥ pītaye vṛṣā somaḥ pavitre arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:555: RV_9,037.02a sa pavitre vicakṣaṇo harir arṣati dharṇasiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:557: RV_9,037.03a sa vājī rocanā divaḥ pavamāno vi dhāvati |
GV01rv_hn09u:559: RV_9,037.04a sa tritasyādhi sānavi pavamāno arocayat |
GV01rv_hn09u:561: RV_9,037.05a sa vṛtrahā vṛṣā suto varivovid adābhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:563: RV_9,037.06a sa devaḥ kavineṣito 'bhi droṇāni dhāvati |
GV01rv_hn09u:565: RV_9,038.01a eṣa u sya vṛṣā ratho 'vyo vārebhir arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:567: RV_9,038.02a etaṃ tritasya yoṣaṇo hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:569: RV_9,038.03a etaṃ tyaṃ harito daśa marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:571: RV_9,038.04a eṣa sya mānuṣīṣv ā śyeno na vikṣu sīdati |
GV01rv_hn09u:573: RV_9,038.05a eṣa sya madyo raso 'va caṣṭe divaḥ śiśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:575: RV_9,038.06a eṣa sya pītaye suto harir arṣati dharṇasiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:577: RV_9,039.01a āśur arṣa bṛhanmate pari priyeṇa dhāmnā |
GV01rv_hn09u:579: RV_9,039.02a pariṣkṛṇvann aniṣkṛtaṃ janāya yātayann iṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:581: RV_9,039.03a suta eti pavitra ā tviṣiṃ dadhāna ojasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:583: RV_9,039.04a ayaṃ sa yo divas pari raghuyāmā pavitra ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:585: RV_9,039.05a āvivāsan parāvato atho arvāvataḥ sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:587: RV_9,039.06a samīcīnā anūṣata hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:589: RV_9,040.01a punāno akramīd abhi viśvā mṛdho vicarṣaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:591: RV_9,040.02a ā yonim aruṇo ruhad gamad indraṃ vṛṣā sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:593: RV_9,040.03a nū no rayim mahām indo 'smabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:595: RV_9,040.04a viśvā soma pavamāna dyumnānīndav ā bhara |
GV01rv_hn09u:597: RV_9,040.05a sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṃ stotre suvīryam |
GV01rv_hn09u:599: RV_9,040.06a punāna indav ā bhara soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim |
GV01rv_hn09u:601: RV_9,041.01a pra ye gāvo na bhūrṇayas tveṣā ayāso akramuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:605: RV_9,041.03a śṛṇve vṛṣṭer iva svanaḥ pavamānasya śuṣmiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:607: RV_9,041.04a ā pavasva mahīm iṣaṃ gomad indo hiraṇyavat |
GV01rv_hn09u:609: RV_9,041.05a sa pavasva vicarṣaṇa ā mahī rodasī pṛṇa |
GV01rv_hn09u:611: RV_9,041.06a pari ṇaḥ śarmayantyā dhārayā soma viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:613: RV_9,042.01a janayan rocanā divo janayann apsu sūryam |
GV01rv_hn09u:615: RV_9,042.02a eṣa pratnena manmanā devo devebhyas pari |
GV01rv_hn09u:619: RV_9,042.04a duhānaḥ pratnam it payaḥ pavitre pari ṣicyate |
GV01rv_hn09u:621: RV_9,042.05a abhi viśvāni vāryābhi devāṃ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:623: RV_9,042.06a goman naḥ soma vīravad aśvāvad vājavat sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:625: RV_9,043.01a yo atya iva mṛjyate gobhir madāya haryataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:627: RV_9,043.02a taṃ no viśvā avasyuvo giraḥ śumbhanti pūrvathā |
GV01rv_hn09u:629: RV_9,043.03a punāno yāti haryataḥ somo gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:631: RV_9,043.04a pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṃ soma suśriyam |
GV01rv_hn09u:633: RV_9,043.05a indur atyo na vājasṛt kanikranti pavitra ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:635: RV_9,043.06a pavasva vājasātaye viprasya gṛṇato vṛdhe |
GV01rv_hn09u:637: RV_9,044.01a pra ṇa indo mahe tana ūrmiṃ na bibhrad arṣasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:639: RV_9,044.02a matī juṣṭo dhiyā hitaḥ somo hinve parāvati |
GV01rv_hn09u:641: RV_9,044.03a ayaṃ deveṣu jāgṛviḥ suta eti pavitra ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:643: RV_9,044.04a sa naḥ pavasva vājayuś cakrāṇaś cārum adhvaram |
GV01rv_hn09u:645: RV_9,044.05a sa no bhagāya vāyave vipravīraḥ sadāvṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:647: RV_9,044.06a sa no adya vasuttaye kratuvid gātuvittamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:649: RV_9,045.01a sa pavasva madāya kaṃ nṛcakṣā devavītaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:651: RV_9,045.02a sa no arṣābhi dūtyaṃ tvam indrāya tośase |
GV01rv_hn09u:653: RV_9,045.03a uta tvām aruṇaṃ vayaṃ gobhir añjmo madāya kam |
GV01rv_hn09u:654: RV_9,045.03c vi no rāye duro vṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:655: RV_9,045.04a aty ū pavitram akramīd vājī dhuraṃ na yāmani |
GV01rv_hn09u:657: RV_9,045.05a sam ī sakhāyo asvaran vane krīḷantam atyavim |
GV01rv_hn09u:659: RV_9,045.06a tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā pīto vicakṣase |
GV01rv_hn09u:665: RV_9,046.03a ete somāsa indavaḥ prayasvantaś camū sutāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:667: RV_9,046.04a ā dhāvatā suhastyaḥ śukrā gṛbhṇīta manthinā |
GV01rv_hn09u:669: RV_9,046.05a sa pavasva dhanañjaya prayantā rādhaso mahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:671: RV_9,046.06a etam mṛjanti marjyam pavamānaṃ daśa kṣipaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:673: RV_9,047.01a ayā somaḥ sukṛtyayā mahaś cid abhy avardhata |
GV01rv_hn09u:675: RV_9,047.02a kṛtānīd asya kartvā cetante dasyutarhaṇā |
GV01rv_hn09u:677: RV_9,047.03a āt soma indriyo raso vajraḥ sahasrasā bhuvat |
GV01rv_hn09u:679: RV_9,047.04a svayaṃ kavir vidhartari viprāya ratnam icchati |
GV01rv_hn09u:681: RV_9,047.05a siṣāsatū rayīṇāṃ vājeṣv arvatām iva |
GV01rv_hn09u:683: RV_9,048.01a taṃ tvā nṛmṇāni bibhrataṃ sadhastheṣu maho divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:687: RV_9,048.03a atas tvā rayim abhi rājānaṃ sukrato divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:689: RV_9,048.04a viśvasmā it svar dṛśe sādhāraṇaṃ rajasturam |
GV01rv_hn09u:691: RV_9,048.05a adhā hinvāna indriyaṃ jyāyo mahitvam ānaśe |
GV01rv_hn09u:693: RV_9,049.01a pavasva vṛṣṭim ā su no 'pām ūrmiṃ divas pari |
GV01rv_hn09u:695: RV_9,049.02a tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā gāva ihāgaman |
GV01rv_hn09u:697: RV_9,049.03a ghṛtam pavasva dhārayā yajñeṣu devavītamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:699: RV_9,049.04a sa na ūrje vy avyayam pavitraṃ dhāva dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:703: RV_9,050.01a ut te śuṣmāsa īrate sindhor ūrmer iva svanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:705: RV_9,050.02a prasave ta ud īrate tisro vāco makhasyuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:707: RV_9,050.03a avyo vāre pari priyaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:709: RV_9,050.04a ā pavasva madintama pavitraṃ dhārayā kave |
GV01rv_hn09u:711: RV_9,050.05a sa pavasva madintama gobhir añjāno aktubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:713: RV_9,051.01a adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutaṃ somam pavitra ā sṛja |
GV01rv_hn09u:715: RV_9,051.02a divaḥ pīyūṣam uttamaṃ somam indrāya vajriṇe |
GV01rv_hn09u:717: RV_9,051.03a tava tya indo andhaso devā madhor vy aśnate |
GV01rv_hn09u:719: RV_9,051.04a tvaṃ hi soma vardhayan suto madāya bhūrṇaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:721: RV_9,051.05a abhy arṣa vicakṣaṇa pavitraṃ dhārayā sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:723: RV_9,052.01a pari dyukṣaḥ sanadrayir bharad vājaṃ no andhasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:725: RV_9,052.02a tava pratnebhir adhvabhir avyo vāre pari priyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:727: RV_9,052.03a carur na yas tam īṅkhayendo na dānam īṅkhaya |
GV01rv_hn09u:729: RV_9,052.04a ni śuṣmam indav eṣām puruhūta janānām |
GV01rv_hn09u:731: RV_9,052.05a śataṃ na inda ūtibhiḥ sahasraṃ vā śucīnām |
GV01rv_hn09u:733: RV_9,053.01a ut te śuṣmāso asthū rakṣo bhindanto adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:735: RV_9,053.02a ayā nijaghnir ojasā rathasaṃge dhane hite |
GV01rv_hn09u:737: RV_9,053.03a asya vratāni nādhṛṣe pavamānasya dūḍhyā |
GV01rv_hn09u:739: RV_9,053.04a taṃ hinvanti madacyutaṃ hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam |
GV01rv_hn09u:741: RV_9,054.01a asya pratnām anu dyutaṃ śukraṃ duduhre ahrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:743: RV_9,054.02a ayaṃ sūrya ivopadṛg ayaṃ sarāṃsi dhāvati |
GV01rv_hn09u:745: RV_9,054.03a ayaṃ viśvāni tiṣṭhati punāno bhuvanopari |
GV01rv_hn09u:747: RV_9,054.04a pari ṇo devavītaye vājāṃ arṣasi gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:749: RV_9,055.01a yavaṃ-yavaṃ no andhasā puṣṭam-puṣṭam pari srava |
GV01rv_hn09u:751: RV_9,055.02a indo yathā tava stavo yathā te jātam andhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:753: RV_9,055.03a uta no govid aśvavit pavasva somāndhasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:755: RV_9,055.04a yo jināti na jīyate hanti śatrum abhītya |
GV01rv_hn09u:757: RV_9,056.01a pari soma ṛtam bṛhad āśuḥ pavitre arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:759: RV_9,056.02a yat somo vājam arṣati śataṃ dhārā apasyuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:761: RV_9,056.03a abhi tvā yoṣaṇo daśa jāraṃ na kanyānūṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:763: RV_9,056.04a tvam indrāya viṣṇave svādur indo pari srava |
GV01rv_hn09u:765: RV_9,057.01a pra te dhārā asaścato divo na yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:767: RV_9,057.02a abhi priyāṇi kāvyā viśvā cakṣāṇo arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:769: RV_9,057.03a sa marmṛjāna āyubhir ibho rājeva suvrataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:771: RV_9,057.04a sa no viśvā divo vasūto pṛthivyā adhi |
GV01rv_hn09u:773: RV_9,058.01a tarat sa mandī dhāvati dhārā sutasyāndhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:775: RV_9,058.02a usrā veda vasūnām martasya devy avasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:777: RV_9,058.03a dhvasrayoḥ puruṣantyor ā sahasrāṇi dadmahe |
GV01rv_hn09u:779: RV_9,058.04a ā yayos triṃśataṃ tanā sahasrāṇi ca dadmahe |
GV01rv_hn09u:781: RV_9,059.01a pavasva gojid aśvajid viśvajit soma raṇyajit |
GV01rv_hn09u:785: RV_9,059.03a tvaṃ soma pavamāno viśvāni duritā tara |
GV01rv_hn09u:787: RV_9,059.04a pavamāna svar vido jāyamāno 'bhavo mahān |
GV01rv_hn09u:789: RV_9,060.01a pra gāyatreṇa gāyata pavamānaṃ vicarṣaṇim |
GV01rv_hn09u:791: RV_9,060.02a taṃ tvā sahasracakṣasam atho sahasrabharṇasam |
GV01rv_hn09u:793: RV_9,060.03a ati vārān pavamāno asiṣyadat kalaśāṃ abhi dhāvati |
GV01rv_hn09u:795: RV_9,060.04a indrasya soma rādhase śam pavasva vicarṣaṇe |
GV01rv_hn09u:797: RV_9,061.01a ayā vītī pari srava yas ta indo madeṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:799: RV_9,061.02a puraḥ sadya itthādhiye divodāsāya śambaram |
GV01rv_hn09u:801: RV_9,061.03a pari ṇo aśvam aśvavid gomad indo hiraṇyavat |
GV01rv_hn09u:803: RV_9,061.04a pavamānasya te vayam pavitram abhyundataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:805: RV_9,061.05a ye te pavitram ūrmayo 'bhikṣaranti dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:807: RV_9,061.06a sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṃ vīravatīm iṣam |
GV01rv_hn09u:809: RV_9,061.07a etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sindhumātaram |
GV01rv_hn09u:811: RV_9,061.08a sam indreṇota vāyunā suta eti pavitra ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:813: RV_9,061.09a sa no bhagāya vāyave pūṣṇe pavasva madhumān |
GV01rv_hn09u:815: RV_9,061.10a uccā te jātam andhaso divi ṣad bhūmy ā dade |
GV01rv_hn09u:817: RV_9,061.11a enā viśvāny arya ā dyumnāni mānuṣāṇām |
GV01rv_hn09u:819: RV_9,061.12a sa na indrāya yajyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:821: RV_9,061.13a upo ṣu jātam apturaṃ gobhir bhaṅgam pariṣkṛtam |
GV01rv_hn09u:823: RV_9,061.14a tam id vardhantu no giro vatsaṃ saṃśiśvarīr iva |
GV01rv_hn09u:825: RV_9,061.15a arṣā ṇaḥ soma śaṃ gave dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam |
GV01rv_hn09u:827: RV_9,061.16a pavamāno ajījanad divaś citraṃ na tanyatum |
GV01rv_hn09u:829: RV_9,061.17a pavamānasya te raso mado rājann aducchunaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:831: RV_9,061.18a pavamāna rasas tava dakṣo vi rājati dyumān |
GV01rv_hn09u:833: RV_9,061.19a yas te mado vareṇyas tenā pavasvāndhasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:835: RV_9,061.20a jaghnir vṛtram amitriyaṃ sasnir vājaṃ dive-dive |
GV01rv_hn09u:837: RV_9,061.21a sammiślo aruṣo bhava sūpasthābhir na dhenubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:838: RV_9,061.21c sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:839: RV_9,061.22a sa pavasva ya āvithendraṃ vṛtrāya hantave |
GV01rv_hn09u:841: RV_9,061.23a suvīrāso vayaṃ dhanā jayema soma mīḍhvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:843: RV_9,061.24a tvotāsas tavāvasā syāma vanvanta āmuraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:845: RV_9,061.25a apaghnan pavate mṛdho 'pa somo arāvṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:847: RV_9,061.26a maho no rāya ā bhara pavamāna jahī mṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:849: RV_9,061.27a na tvā śataṃ cana hruto rādho ditsantam ā minan |
GV01rv_hn09u:851: RV_9,061.28a pavasvendo vṛṣā sutaḥ kṛdhī no yaśaso jane |
GV01rv_hn09u:853: RV_9,061.29a asya te sakhye vayaṃ tavendo dyumna uttame |
GV01rv_hn09u:855: RV_9,061.30a yā te bhīmāny āyudhā tigmāni santi dhūrvaṇe |
GV01rv_hn09u:857: RV_9,062.01a ete asṛgram indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:859: RV_9,062.02a vighnanto duritā puru sugā tokāya vājinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:861: RV_9,062.03a kṛṇvanto varivo gave 'bhy arṣanti suṣṭutim |
GV01rv_hn09u:863: RV_9,062.04a asāvy aṃśur madāyāpsu dakṣo giriṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:865: RV_9,062.05a śubhram andho devavātam apsu dhūto nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:867: RV_9,062.06a ād īm aśvaṃ na hetāro 'śūśubhann amṛtāya |
GV01rv_hn09u:869: RV_9,062.07a yās te dhārā madhuścuto 'sṛgram inda ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:871: RV_9,062.08a so arṣendrāya pītaye tiro romāṇy avyayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:873: RV_9,062.09a tvam indo pari srava svādiṣṭho aṅgirobhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:875: RV_9,062.10a ayaṃ vicarṣaṇir hitaḥ pavamānaḥ sa cetati |
GV01rv_hn09u:877: RV_9,062.11a eṣa vṛṣā vṛṣavrataḥ pavamāno aśastihā |
GV01rv_hn09u:879: RV_9,062.12a ā pavasva sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam |
GV01rv_hn09u:881: RV_9,062.13a eṣa sya pari ṣicyate marmṛjyamāna āyubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:883: RV_9,062.14a sahasrotiḥ śatāmagho vimāno rajasaḥ kaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:885: RV_9,062.15a girā jāta iha stuta indur indrāya dhīyate |
GV01rv_hn09u:887: RV_9,062.16a pavamānaḥ suto nṛbhiḥ somo vājam ivāsarat |
GV01rv_hn09u:889: RV_9,062.17a taṃ tripṛṣṭhe trivandhure rathe yuñjanti yātave |
GV01rv_hn09u:891: RV_9,062.18a taṃ sotāro dhanaspṛtam āśuṃ vājāya yātave |
GV01rv_hn09u:893: RV_9,062.19a āviśan kalaśaṃ suto viśvā arṣann abhi śriyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:895: RV_9,062.20a ā ta indo madāya kam payo duhanty āyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:897: RV_9,062.21a ā naḥ somam pavitra ā sṛjatā madhumattamam |
GV01rv_hn09u:899: RV_9,062.22a ete somā asṛkṣata gṛṇānāḥ śravase mahe |
GV01rv_hn09u:901: RV_9,062.23a abhi gavyāni vītaye nṛmṇā punāno arṣasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:903: RV_9,062.24a uta no gomatīr iṣo viśvā arṣa pariṣṭubhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:905: RV_9,062.25a pavasva vāco agriyaḥ soma citrābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:907: RV_9,062.26a tvaṃ samudriyā apo 'griyo vāca īrayan |
GV01rv_hn09u:909: RV_9,062.27a tubhyemā bhuvanā kave mahimne soma tasthire |
GV01rv_hn09u:911: RV_9,062.28a pra te divo na vṛṣṭayo dhārā yanty asaścataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:915: RV_9,062.30a pavamāna ṛtaḥ kaviḥ somaḥ pavitram āsadat |
GV01rv_hn09u:917: RV_9,063.01a ā pavasva sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ soma suvīryam |
GV01rv_hn09u:919: RV_9,063.02a iṣam ūrjaṃ ca pinvasa indrāya matsarintamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:921: RV_9,063.03a suta indrāya viṣṇave somaḥ kalaśe akṣarat |
GV01rv_hn09u:923: RV_9,063.04a ete asṛgram āśavo 'ti hvarāṃsi babhravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:925: RV_9,063.05a indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvanto viśvam āryam |
GV01rv_hn09u:927: RV_9,063.06a sutā anu svam ā rajo 'bhy arṣanti babhravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:929: RV_9,063.07a ayā pavasva dhārayā yayā sūryam arocayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:931: RV_9,063.08a ayukta sūra etaśam pavamāno manāv adhi |
GV01rv_hn09u:933: RV_9,063.09a uta tyā harito daśa sūro ayukta yātave |
GV01rv_hn09u:935: RV_9,063.10a parīto vāyave sutaṃ gira indrāya matsaram |
GV01rv_hn09u:937: RV_9,063.11a pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṃ soma duṣṭaram |
GV01rv_hn09u:939: RV_9,063.12a abhy arṣa sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam |
GV01rv_hn09u:941: RV_9,063.13a somo devo na sūryo 'dribhiḥ pavate sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:943: RV_9,063.14a ete dhāmāny āryā śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:945: RV_9,063.15a sutā indrāya vajriṇe somāso dadhyāśiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:947: RV_9,063.16a pra soma madhumattamo rāye arṣa pavitra ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:949: RV_9,063.17a tam ī mṛjanty āyavo hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam |
GV01rv_hn09u:951: RV_9,063.18a ā pavasva hiraṇyavad aśvāvat soma vīravat |
GV01rv_hn09u:953: RV_9,063.19a pari vāje na vājayum avyo vāreṣu siñcata |
GV01rv_hn09u:955: RV_9,063.20a kavim mṛjanti marjyaṃ dhībhir viprā avasyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:957: RV_9,063.21a vṛṣaṇaṃ dhībhir apturaṃ somam ṛtasya dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:959: RV_9,063.22a pavasva devāyuṣag indraṃ gacchatu te madaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:961: RV_9,063.23a pavamāna ni tośase rayiṃ soma śravāyyam |
GV01rv_hn09u:963: RV_9,063.24a apaghnan pavase mṛdhaḥ kratuvit soma matsaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:965: RV_9,063.25a pavamānā asṛkṣata somāḥ śukrāsa indavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:967: RV_9,063.26a pavamānāsa āśavaḥ śubhrā asṛgram indavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:969: RV_9,063.27a pavamānā divas pary antarikṣād asṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:971: RV_9,063.28a punānaḥ soma dhārayendo viśvā apa sridhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:973: RV_9,063.29a apaghnan soma rakṣaso 'bhy arṣa kanikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:975: RV_9,063.30a asme vasūni dhāraya soma divyāni pārthivā |
GV01rv_hn09u:977: RV_9,064.01a vṛṣā soma dyumāṃ asi vṛṣā deva vṛṣavrataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:979: RV_9,064.02a vṛṣṇas te vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo vṛṣā vanaṃ vṛṣā madaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:981: RV_9,064.03a aśvo na cakrado vṛṣā saṃ gā indo sam arvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:982: RV_9,064.03c vi no rāye duro vṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:983: RV_9,064.04a asṛkṣata pra vājino gavyā somāso aśvayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:987: RV_9,064.06a te viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somā divyāni pārthivā |
GV01rv_hn09u:989: RV_9,064.07a pavamānasya viśvavit pra te sargā asṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:991: RV_9,064.08a ketuṃ kṛṇvan divas pari viśvā rūpābhy arṣasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:993: RV_9,064.09a hinvāno vācam iṣyasi pavamāna vidharmaṇi |
GV01rv_hn09u:995: RV_9,064.10a induḥ paviṣṭa cetanaḥ priyaḥ kavīnām matī |
GV01rv_hn09u:997: RV_9,064.11a ūrmir yas te pavitra ā devāvīḥ paryakṣarat |
GV01rv_hn09u:999: RV_9,064.12a sa no arṣa pavitra ā mado yo devavītamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1001: RV_9,064.13a iṣe pavasva dhārayā mṛjyamāno manīṣibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1003: RV_9,064.14a punāno varivas kṛdhy ūrjaṃ janāya girvaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1005: RV_9,064.15a punāno devavītaya indrasya yāhi niṣkṛtam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1007: RV_9,064.16a pra hinvānāsa indavo 'cchā samudram āśavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1009: RV_9,064.17a marmṛjānāsa āyavo vṛthā samudram indavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1011: RV_9,064.18a pari ṇo yāhy asmayur viśvā vasūny ojasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1013: RV_9,064.19a mimāti vahnir etaśaḥ padaṃ yujāna ṛkvabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1015: RV_9,064.20a ā yad yoniṃ hiraṇyayam āśur ṛtasya sīdati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1021: RV_9,064.23a taṃ tvā viprā vacovidaḥ pari ṣkṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1023: RV_9,064.24a rasaṃ te mitro aryamā pibanti varuṇaḥ kave |
GV01rv_hn09u:1025: RV_9,064.25a tvaṃ soma vipaścitam punāno vācam iṣyasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1027: RV_9,064.26a uto sahasrabharṇasaṃ vācaṃ soma makhasyuvam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1029: RV_9,064.27a punāna indav eṣām puruhūta janānām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1033: RV_9,064.29a hinvāno hetṛbhir yata ā vājaṃ vājy akramīt |
GV01rv_hn09u:1035: RV_9,064.30a ṛdhak soma svastaye saṃjagmāno divaḥ kaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1037: RV_9,065.01a hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ svasāro jāmayas patim |
GV01rv_hn09u:1039: RV_9,065.02a pavamāna rucā-rucā devo devebhyas pari |
GV01rv_hn09u:1041: RV_9,065.03a ā pavamāna suṣṭutiṃ vṛṣṭiṃ devebhyo duvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1043: RV_9,065.04a vṛṣā hy asi bhānunā dyumantaṃ tvā havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn09u:1045: RV_9,065.05a ā pavasva suvīryam mandamānaḥ svāyudha |
GV01rv_hn09u:1046: RV_9,065.05c iho ṣv indav ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1047: RV_9,065.06a yad adbhiḥ pariṣicyase mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1049: RV_9,065.07a pra somāya vyaśvavat pavamānāya gāyata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1051: RV_9,065.08a yasya varṇam madhuścutaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1053: RV_9,065.09a tasya te vājino vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1055: RV_9,065.10a vṛṣā pavasva dhārayā marutvate ca matsaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1057: RV_9,065.11a taṃ tvā dhartāram oṇyoḥ pavamāna svardṛśam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1059: RV_9,065.12a ayā citto vipānayā hariḥ pavasva dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1061: RV_9,065.13a ā na indo mahīm iṣam pavasva viśvadarśataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1063: RV_9,065.14a ā kalaśā anūṣatendo dhārābhir ojasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1065: RV_9,065.15a yasya te madyaṃ rasaṃ tīvraṃ duhanty adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1067: RV_9,065.16a rājā medhābhir īyate pavamāno manāv adhi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1069: RV_9,065.17a ā na indo śatagvinaṃ gavām poṣaṃ svaśvyam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1071: RV_9,065.18a ā naḥ soma saho juvo rūpaṃ na varcase bhara |
GV01rv_hn09u:1073: RV_9,065.19a arṣā soma dyumattamo 'bhi droṇāni roruvat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1074: RV_9,065.19c sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1075: RV_9,065.20a apsā indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1077: RV_9,065.21a iṣaṃ tokāya no dadhad asmabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1079: RV_9,065.22a ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire |
GV01rv_hn09u:1081: RV_9,065.23a ya ārjīkeṣu kṛtvasu ye madhye pastyānām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1083: RV_9,065.24a te no vṛṣṭiṃ divas pari pavantām ā suvīryam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1085: RV_9,065.25a pavate haryato harir gṛṇāno jamadagninā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1087: RV_9,065.26a pra śukrāso vayojuvo hinvānāso na saptayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1089: RV_9,065.27a taṃ tvā suteṣv ābhuvo hinvire devatātaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:1091: RV_9,065.28a ā te dakṣam mayobhuvaṃ vahnim adyā vṛṇīmahe |
GV01rv_hn09u:1093: RV_9,065.29a ā mandram ā vareṇyam ā vipram ā manīṣiṇam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1095: RV_9,065.30a ā rayim ā sucetunam ā sukrato tanūṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1099: RV_9,066.02a tābhyāṃ viśvasya rājasi ye pavamāna dhāmanī |
GV01rv_hn09u:1101: RV_9,066.03a pari dhāmāni yāni te tvaṃ somāsi viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1103: RV_9,066.04a pavasva janayann iṣo 'bhi viśvāni vāryā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1105: RV_9,066.05a tava śukrāso arcayo divas pṛṣṭhe vi tanvate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1107: RV_9,066.06a taveme sapta sindhavaḥ praśiṣaṃ soma sisrate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1109: RV_9,066.07a pra soma yāhi dhārayā suta indrāya matsaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1111: RV_9,066.08a sam u tvā dhībhir asvaran hinvatīḥ sapta jāmayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1113: RV_9,066.09a mṛjanti tvā sam agruvo 'vye jīrāv adhi ṣvaṇi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1115: RV_9,066.10a pavamānasya te kave vājin sargā asṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1117: RV_9,066.11a acchā kośam madhuścutam asṛgraṃ vāre avyaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:1119: RV_9,066.12a acchā samudram indavo 'staṃ gāvo na dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1121: RV_9,066.13a pra ṇa indo mahe raṇa āpo arṣanti sindhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1123: RV_9,066.14a asya te sakhye vayam iyakṣantas tvotayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1125: RV_9,066.15a ā pavasva gaviṣṭaye mahe soma nṛcakṣase |
GV01rv_hn09u:1127: RV_9,066.16a mahāṃ asi soma jyeṣṭha ugrāṇām inda ojiṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1129: RV_9,066.17a ya ugrebhyaś cid ojīyāñ chūrebhyaś cic chūrataraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1131: RV_9,066.18a tvaṃ soma sūra eṣas tokasya sātā tanūnām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1133: RV_9,066.19a agna āyūṃṣi pavasa ā suvorjam iṣaṃ ca naḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1135: RV_9,066.20a agnir ṛṣiḥ pavamānaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1137: RV_9,066.21a agne pavasva svapā asme varcaḥ suvīryam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1139: RV_9,066.22a pavamāno ati sridho 'bhy arṣati suṣṭutim |
GV01rv_hn09u:1141: RV_9,066.23a sa marmṛjāna āyubhiḥ prayasvān prayase hitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1143: RV_9,066.24a pavamāna ṛtam bṛhac chukraṃ jyotir ajījanat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1145: RV_9,066.25a pavamānasya jaṅghnato hareś candrā asṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1149: RV_9,066.27a pavamāno vy aśnavad raśmibhir vājasātamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1151: RV_9,066.28a pra suvāna indur akṣāḥ pavitram aty avyayam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1153: RV_9,066.29a eṣa somo adhi tvaci gavāṃ krīḷaty adribhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1155: RV_9,066.30a yasya te dyumnavat payaḥ pavamānābhṛtaṃ divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1157: RV_9,067.01a tvaṃ somāsi dhārayur mandra ojiṣṭho adhvare |
GV01rv_hn09u:1159: RV_9,067.02a tvaṃ suto nṛmādano dadhanvān matsarintamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1161: RV_9,067.03a tvaṃ suṣvāṇo adribhir abhy arṣa kanikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1163: RV_9,067.04a indur hinvāno arṣati tiro vārāṇy avyayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1165: RV_9,067.05a indo vy avyam arṣasi vi śravāṃsi vi saubhagā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1167: RV_9,067.06a ā na indo śatagvinaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1169: RV_9,067.07a pavamānāsa indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1171: RV_9,067.08a kakuhaḥ somyo rasa indur indrāya pūrvyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1173: RV_9,067.09a hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ pavamānam madhuścutam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1175: RV_9,067.10a avitā no ajāśvaḥ pūṣā yāmani-yāmani |
GV01rv_hn09u:1177: RV_9,067.11a ayaṃ somaḥ kapardine ghṛtaṃ na pavate madhu |
GV01rv_hn09u:1179: RV_9,067.12a ayaṃ ta āghṛṇe suto ghṛtaṃ na pavate śuci |
GV01rv_hn09u:1181: RV_9,067.13a vāco jantuḥ kavīnām pavasva soma dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1183: RV_9,067.14a ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati śyeno varma vi gāhate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1185: RV_9,067.15a pari pra soma te raso 'sarji kalaśe sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1187: RV_9,067.16a pavasva soma mandayann indrāya madhumattamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1188: RV_9,067.17a asṛgran devavītaye vājayanto rathā iva ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1189: RV_9,067.18a te sutāso madintamāḥ śukrā vāyum asṛkṣata ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1190: RV_9,067.19a grāvṇā tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitraṃ soma gacchasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1192: RV_9,067.20a eṣa tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram ati gāhate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1194: RV_9,067.21a yad anti yac ca dūrake bhayaṃ vindati mām iha |
GV01rv_hn09u:1196: RV_9,067.22a pavamānaḥ so adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1197: RV_9,067.22c yaḥ potā sa punātu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1198: RV_9,067.23a yat te pavitram arciṣy agne vitatam antar ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1200: RV_9,067.24a yat te pavitram arcivad agne tena punīhi naḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1202: RV_9,067.25a ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca |
GV01rv_hn09u:1204: RV_9,067.26a tribhiṣ ṭvaṃ deva savitar varṣiṣṭhaiḥ soma dhāmabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1206: RV_9,067.27a punantu māṃ devajanāḥ punantu vasavo dhiyā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1207: RV_9,067.27c viśve devāḥ punīta mā jātavedaḥ punīhi mā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1208: RV_9,067.28a pra pyāyasva pra syandasva soma viśvebhir aṃśubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1210: RV_9,067.29a upa priyam panipnataṃ yuvānam āhutīvṛdham |
GV01rv_hn09u:1212: RV_9,067.30a alāyyasya paraśur nanāśa tam ā pavasva deva soma |
GV01rv_hn09u:1213: RV_9,067.30c ākhuṃ cid eva deva soma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1214: RV_9,067.31a yaḥ pāvamānīr adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1215: RV_9,067.31c sarvaṃ sa pūtam aśnāti svaditam mātariśvanā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1216: RV_9,067.32a pāvamānīr yo adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1217: RV_9,067.32c tasmai sarasvatī duhe kṣīraṃ sarpir madhūdakam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1218: RV_9,068.01a pra devam acchā madhumanta indavo 'siṣyadanta gāva ā na dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1219: RV_9,068.01c barhiṣado vacanāvanta ūdhabhiḥ parisrutam usriyā nirṇijaṃ dhire ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1220: RV_9,068.02a sa roruvad abhi pūrvā acikradad upāruhaḥ śrathayan svādate hariḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1221: RV_9,068.02c tiraḥ pavitram pariyann uru jrayo ni śaryāṇi dadhate deva ā varam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1222: RV_9,068.03a vi yo mame yamyā saṃyatī madaḥ sākaṃvṛdhā payasā pinvad akṣitā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1223: RV_9,068.03c mahī apāre rajasī vivevidad abhivrajann akṣitam pāja ā dade ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1224: RV_9,068.04a sa mātarā vicaran vājayann apaḥ pra medhiraḥ svadhayā pinvate padam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1225: RV_9,068.04c aṃśur yavena pipiśe yato nṛbhiḥ saṃ jāmibhir nasate rakṣate śiraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1226: RV_9,068.05a saṃ dakṣeṇa manasā jāyate kavir ṛtasya garbho nihito yamā paraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1227: RV_9,068.05c yūnā ha santā prathamaṃ vi jajñatur guhā hitaṃ janima nemam udyatam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1228: RV_9,068.06a mandrasya rūpaṃ vividur manīṣiṇaḥ śyeno yad andho abharat parāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1229: RV_9,068.06c tam marjayanta suvṛdhaṃ nadīṣv āṃ uśantam aṃśum pariyantam ṛgmiyam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1230: RV_9,068.07a tvām mṛjanti daśa yoṣaṇaḥ sutaṃ soma ṛṣibhir matibhir dhītibhir hitam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1231: RV_9,068.07c avyo vārebhir uta devahūtibhir nṛbhir yato vājam ā darṣi sātaye ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1232: RV_9,068.08a pariprayantaṃ vayyaṃ suṣaṃsadaṃ somam manīṣā abhy anūṣata stubhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1233: RV_9,068.08c yo dhārayā madhumāṃ ūrmiṇā diva iyarti vācaṃ rayiṣāḷ amartyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1234: RV_9,068.09a ayaṃ diva iyarti viśvam ā rajaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1235: RV_9,068.09c adbhir gobhir mṛjyate adribhiḥ sutaḥ punāna indur varivo vidat priyam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1236: RV_9,068.10a evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāno vayo dadhac citratamam pavasva |
GV01rv_hn09u:1237: RV_9,068.10c adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayim asme suvīram ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1238: RV_9,069.01a iṣur na dhanvan prati dhīyate matir vatso na mātur upa sarjy ūdhani |
GV01rv_hn09u:1239: RV_9,069.01c urudhāreva duhe agra āyaty asya vrateṣv api soma iṣyate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1240: RV_9,069.02a upo matiḥ pṛcyate sicyate madhu mandrājanī codate antar āsani |
GV01rv_hn09u:1241: RV_9,069.02c pavamānaḥ saṃtaniḥ praghnatām iva madhumān drapsaḥ pari vāram arṣati ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1242: RV_9,069.03a avye vadhūyuḥ pavate pari tvaci śrathnīte naptīr aditer ṛtaṃ yate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1243: RV_9,069.03c harir akrān yajataḥ saṃyato mado nṛmṇā śiśāno mahiṣo na śobhate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1244: RV_9,069.04a ukṣā mimāti prati yanti dhenavo devasya devīr upa yanti niṣkṛtam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1245: RV_9,069.04c aty akramīd arjunaṃ vāram avyayam atkaṃ na niktam pari somo avyata ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1246: RV_9,069.05a amṛktena ruśatā vāsasā harir amartyo nirṇijānaḥ pari vyata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1247: RV_9,069.05c divas pṛṣṭham barhaṇā nirṇije kṛtopastaraṇaṃ camvor nabhasmayam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1248: RV_9,069.06a sūryasyeva raśmayo drāvayitnavo matsarāsaḥ prasupaḥ sākam īrate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1249: RV_9,069.06c tantuṃ tatam pari sargāsa āśavo nendrād ṛte pavate dhāma kiṃ cana ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1250: RV_9,069.07a sindhor iva pravaṇe nimna āśavo vṛṣacyutā madāso gātum āśata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1251: RV_9,069.07c śaṃ no niveśe dvipade catuṣpade 'sme vājāḥ soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1252: RV_9,069.08a ā naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavad aśvāvad gomad yavamat suvīryam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1253: RV_9,069.08c yūyaṃ hi soma pitaro mama sthana divo mūrdhānaḥ prasthitā vayaskṛtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1254: RV_9,069.09a ete somāḥ pavamānāsa indraṃ rathā iva pra yayuḥ sātim accha |
GV01rv_hn09u:1255: RV_9,069.09c sutāḥ pavitram ati yanty avyaṃ hitvī vavriṃ harito vṛṣṭim accha ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1256: RV_9,069.10a indav indrāya bṛhate pavasva sumṛḷīko anavadyo riśādāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1257: RV_9,069.10c bharā candrāṇi gṛṇate vasūni devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1258: RV_9,070.01a trir asmai sapta dhenavo duduhre satyām āśiram pūrvye vyomani |
GV01rv_hn09u:1259: RV_9,070.01c catvāry anyā bhuvanāni nirṇije cārūṇi cakre yad ṛtair avardhata ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1260: RV_9,070.02a sa bhikṣamāṇo amṛtasya cāruṇa ubhe dyāvā kāvyenā vi śaśrathe |
GV01rv_hn09u:1261: RV_9,070.02c tejiṣṭhā apo maṃhanā pari vyata yadī devasya śravasā sado viduḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1262: RV_9,070.03a te asya santu ketavo 'mṛtyavo 'dābhyāso januṣī ubhe anu |
GV01rv_hn09u:1263: RV_9,070.03c yebhir nṛmṇā ca devyā ca punata ād id rājānam mananā agṛbhṇata ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1264: RV_9,070.04a sa mṛjyamāno daśabhiḥ sukarmabhiḥ pra madhyamāsu mātṛṣu prame sacā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1265: RV_9,070.04c vratāni pāno amṛtasya cāruṇa ubhe nṛcakṣā anu paśyate viśau ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1266: RV_9,070.05a sa marmṛjāna indriyāya dhāyasa obhe antā rodasī harṣate hitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1267: RV_9,070.05c vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa bādhate vi durmatīr ādediśānaḥ śaryaheva śurudhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1268: RV_9,070.06a sa mātarā na dadṛśāna usriyo nānadad eti marutām iva svanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1269: RV_9,070.06c jānann ṛtam prathamaṃ yat svarṇaram praśastaye kam avṛṇīta sukratuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1270: RV_9,070.07a ruvati bhīmo vṛṣabhas taviṣyayā śṛṅge śiśāno hariṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1271: RV_9,070.07c ā yoniṃ somaḥ sukṛtaṃ ni ṣīdati gavyayī tvag bhavati nirṇig avyayī ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1272: RV_9,070.08a śuciḥ punānas tanvam arepasam avye harir ny adhāviṣṭa sānavi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1273: RV_9,070.08c juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave tridhātu madhu kriyate sukarmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1274: RV_9,070.09a pavasva soma devavītaye vṛṣendrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa |
GV01rv_hn09u:1275: RV_9,070.09c purā no bādhād duritāti pāraya kṣetravid dhi diśa āhā vipṛcchate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1276: RV_9,070.10a hito na saptir abhi vājam arṣendrasyendo jaṭharam ā pavasva |
GV01rv_hn09u:1277: RV_9,070.10c nāvā na sindhum ati parṣi vidvāñ chūro na yudhyann ava no nida spaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1278: RV_9,071.01a ā dakṣiṇā sṛjyate śuṣmy āsadaṃ veti druho rakṣasaḥ pāti jāgṛviḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1279: RV_9,071.01c harir opaśaṃ kṛṇute nabhas paya upastire camvor brahma nirṇije ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1280: RV_9,071.02a pra kṛṣṭiheva śūṣa eti roruvad asuryaṃ varṇaṃ ni riṇīte asya tam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1281: RV_9,071.02c jahāti vavrim pitur eti niṣkṛtam upaprutaṃ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ tanā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1282: RV_9,071.03a adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavate gabhastyor vṛṣāyate nabhasā vepate matī |
GV01rv_hn09u:1283: RV_9,071.03c sa modate nasate sādhate girā nenikte apsu yajate parīmaṇi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1284: RV_9,071.04a pari dyukṣaṃ sahasaḥ parvatāvṛdham madhvaḥ siñcanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim |
GV01rv_hn09u:1285: RV_9,071.04c ā yasmin gāvaḥ suhutāda ūdhani mūrdhañ chrīṇanty agriyaṃ varīmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1286: RV_9,071.05a sam ī rathaṃ na bhurijor aheṣata daśa svasāro aditer upastha ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1287: RV_9,071.05c jigād upa jrayati gor apīcyam padaṃ yad asya matuthā ajījanan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1288: RV_9,071.06a śyeno na yoniṃ sadanaṃ dhiyā kṛtaṃ hiraṇyayam āsadaṃ deva eṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1289: RV_9,071.06c e riṇanti barhiṣi priyaṃ girāśvo na devāṃ apy eti yajñiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1290: RV_9,071.07a parā vyakto aruṣo divaḥ kavir vṛṣā tripṛṣṭho anaviṣṭa gā abhi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1291: RV_9,071.07c sahasraṇītir yatiḥ parāyatī rebho na pūrvīr uṣaso vi rājati ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1292: RV_9,071.08a tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute varṇo asya sa yatrāśayat samṛtā sedhati sridhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1293: RV_9,071.08c apsā yāti svadhayā daivyaṃ janaṃ saṃ suṣṭutī nasate saṃ goagrayā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1294: RV_9,071.09a ukṣeva yūthā pariyann arāvīd adhi tviṣīr adhita sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn09u:1295: RV_9,071.09c divyaḥ suparṇo 'va cakṣata kṣāṃ somaḥ pari kratunā paśyate jāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1296: RV_9,072.01a harim mṛjanty aruṣo na yujyate saṃ dhenubhiḥ kalaśe somo ajyate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1297: RV_9,072.01c ud vācam īrayati hinvate matī puruṣṭutasya kati cit paripriyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1298: RV_9,072.02a sākaṃ vadanti bahavo manīṣiṇa indrasya somaṃ jaṭhare yad āduhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1299: RV_9,072.02c yadī mṛjanti sugabhastayo naraḥ sanīḷābhir daśabhiḥ kāmyam madhu ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1300: RV_9,072.03a aramamāṇo aty eti gā abhi sūryasya priyaṃ duhitus tiro ravam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1301: RV_9,072.03c anv asmai joṣam abharad vinaṅgṛsaḥ saṃ dvayībhiḥ svasṛbhiḥ kṣeti jāmibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1302: RV_9,072.04a nṛdhūto adriṣuto barhiṣi priyaḥ patir gavām pradiva indur ṛtviyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1303: RV_9,072.04c purandhivān manuṣo yajñasādhanaḥ śucir dhiyā pavate soma indra te ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1304: RV_9,072.05a nṛbāhubhyāṃ codito dhārayā suto 'nuṣvadham pavate soma indra te |
GV01rv_hn09u:1305: RV_9,072.05c āprāḥ kratūn sam ajair adhvare matīr ver na druṣac camvor āsadad dhariḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1306: RV_9,072.06a aṃśuṃ duhanti stanayantam akṣitaṃ kaviṃ kavayo 'paso manīṣiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1307: RV_9,072.06c sam ī gāvo matayo yanti saṃyata ṛtasya yonā sadane punarbhuvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1308: RV_9,072.07a nābhā pṛthivyā dharuṇo maho divo 'pām ūrmau sindhuṣv antar ukṣitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1309: RV_9,072.07c indrasya vajro vṛṣabho vibhūvasuḥ somo hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1310: RV_9,072.08a sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ raja stotre śikṣann ādhūnvate ca sukrato |
GV01rv_hn09u:1311: RV_9,072.08c mā no nir bhāg vasunaḥ sādanaspṛśo rayim piśaṅgam bahulaṃ vasīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1312: RV_9,072.09a ā tū na indo śatadātv aśvyaṃ sahasradātu paśumad dhiraṇyavat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1313: RV_9,072.09c upa māsva bṛhatī revatīr iṣo 'dhi stotrasya pavamāna no gahi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1314: RV_9,073.01a srakve drapsasya dhamataḥ sam asvarann ṛtasya yonā sam aranta nābhayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1315: RV_9,073.01c trīn sa mūrdhno asuraś cakra ārabhe satyasya nāvaḥ sukṛtam apīparan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1316: RV_9,073.02a samyak samyañco mahiṣā aheṣata sindhor ūrmāv adhi venā avīvipan |
GV01rv_hn09u:1317: RV_9,073.02c madhor dhārābhir janayanto arkam it priyām indrasya tanvam avīvṛdhan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1318: RV_9,073.03a pavitravantaḥ pari vācam āsate pitaiṣām pratno abhi rakṣati vratam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1319: RV_9,073.03c mahaḥ samudraṃ varuṇas tiro dadhe dhīrā ic chekur dharuṇeṣv ārabham ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1320: RV_9,073.04a sahasradhāre 'va te sam asvaran divo nāke madhujihvā asaścataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1321: RV_9,073.04c asya spaśo na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ pade-pade pāśinaḥ santi setavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1322: RV_9,073.05a pitur mātur adhy ā ye samasvarann ṛcā śocantaḥ saṃdahanto avratān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1323: RV_9,073.05c indradviṣṭām apa dhamanti māyayā tvacam asiknīm bhūmano divas pari ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1324: RV_9,073.06a pratnān mānād adhy ā ye samasvarañ chlokayantrāso rabhasasya mantavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1325: RV_9,073.06c apānakṣāso badhirā ahāsata ṛtasya panthāṃ na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1326: RV_9,073.07a sahasradhāre vitate pavitra ā vācam punanti kavayo manīṣiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1327: RV_9,073.07c rudrāsa eṣām iṣirāso adruha spaśaḥ svañcaḥ sudṛśo nṛcakṣasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1328: RV_9,073.08a ṛtasya gopā na dabhāya sukratus trī ṣa pavitrā hṛdy antar ā dadhe |
GV01rv_hn09u:1329: RV_9,073.08c vidvān sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paśyaty avājuṣṭān vidhyati karte avratān ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1330: RV_9,073.09a ṛtasya tantur vitataḥ pavitra ā jihvāyā agre varuṇasya māyayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1331: RV_9,073.09c dhīrāś cit tat saminakṣanta āśatātrā kartam ava padāty aprabhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1332: RV_9,074.01a śiśur na jāto 'va cakradad vane svar yad vājy aruṣaḥ siṣāsati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1333: RV_9,074.01c divo retasā sacate payovṛdhā tam īmahe sumatī śarma saprathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1334: RV_9,074.02a divo ya skambho dharuṇaḥ svātata āpūrṇo aṃśuḥ paryeti viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1335: RV_9,074.02c seme mahī rodasī yakṣad āvṛtā samīcīne dādhāra sam iṣaḥ kaviḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1336: RV_9,074.03a mahi psaraḥ sukṛtaṃ somyam madhūrvī gavyūtir aditer ṛtaṃ yate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1337: RV_9,074.03c īśe yo vṛṣṭer ita usriyo vṛṣāpāṃ netā ya itaūtir ṛgmiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1338: RV_9,074.04a ātmanvan nabho duhyate ghṛtam paya ṛtasya nābhir amṛtaṃ vi jāyate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1339: RV_9,074.04c samīcīnāḥ sudānavaḥ prīṇanti taṃ naro hitam ava mehanti peravaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1340: RV_9,074.05a arāvīd aṃśuḥ sacamāna ūrmiṇā devāvyam manuṣe pinvati tvacam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1341: RV_9,074.05c dadhāti garbham aditer upastha ā yena tokaṃ ca tanayaṃ ca dhāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1342: RV_9,074.06a sahasradhāre 'va tā asaścatas tṛtīye santu rajasi prajāvatīḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1343: RV_9,074.06c catasro nābho nihitā avo divo havir bharanty amṛtaṃ ghṛtaścutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1344: RV_9,074.07a śvetaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute yat siṣāsati somo mīḍhvāṃ asuro veda bhūmanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1345: RV_9,074.07c dhiyā śamī sacate sem abhi pravad divas kavandham ava darṣad udriṇam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1346: RV_9,074.08a adha śvetaṃ kalaśaṃ gobhir aktaṃ kārṣmann ā vājy akramīt sasavān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1347: RV_9,074.08c ā hinvire manasā devayantaḥ kakṣīvate śatahimāya gonām ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1348: RV_9,074.09a adbhiḥ soma papṛcānasya te raso 'vyo vāraṃ vi pavamāna dhāvati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1349: RV_9,074.09c sa mṛjyamānaḥ kavibhir madintama svadasvendrāya pavamāna pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1350: RV_9,075.01a abhi priyāṇi pavate canohito nāmāni yahvo adhi yeṣu vardhate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1351: RV_9,075.01c ā sūryasya bṛhato bṛhann adhi rathaṃ viṣvañcam aruhad vicakṣaṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1352: RV_9,075.02a ṛtasya jihvā pavate madhu priyaṃ vaktā patir dhiyo asyā adābhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1353: RV_9,075.02c dadhāti putraḥ pitror apīcyaṃ nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1354: RV_9,075.03a ava dyutānaḥ kalaśāṃ acikradan nṛbhir yemānaḥ kośa ā hiraṇyaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:1355: RV_9,075.03c abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣatādhi tripṛṣṭha uṣaso vi rājati ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1356: RV_9,075.04a adribhiḥ suto matibhiś canohitaḥ prarocayan rodasī mātarā śuciḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1357: RV_9,075.04c romāṇy avyā samayā vi dhāvati madhor dhārā pinvamānā dive-dive ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1358: RV_9,075.05a pari soma pra dhanvā svastaye nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vāsayāśiram |
GV01rv_hn09u:1359: RV_9,075.05c ye te madā āhanaso vihāyasas tebhir indraṃ codaya dātave magham ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1360: RV_9,076.01a dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso dakṣo devānām anumādyo nṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1361: RV_9,076.01c hariḥ sṛjāno atyo na satvabhir vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣv ā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1362: RV_9,076.02a śūro na dhatta āyudhā gabhastyoḥ svaḥ siṣāsan rathiro gaviṣṭiṣu |
GV01rv_hn09u:1363: RV_9,076.02c indrasya śuṣmam īrayann apasyubhir indur hinvāno ajyate manīṣibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1364: RV_9,076.03a indrasya soma pavamāna ūrmiṇā taviṣyamāṇo jaṭhareṣv ā viśa |
GV01rv_hn09u:1365: RV_9,076.03c pra ṇaḥ pinva vidyud abhreva rodasī dhiyā na vājāṃ upa māsi śaśvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1366: RV_9,076.04a viśvasya rājā pavate svardṛśa ṛtasya dhītim ṛṣiṣāḷ avīvaśat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1367: RV_9,076.04c yaḥ sūryasyāsireṇa mṛjyate pitā matīnām asamaṣṭakāvyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1368: RV_9,076.05a vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośam arṣasy apām upasthe vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1369: RV_9,076.05c sa indrāya pavase matsarintamo yathā jeṣāma samithe tvotayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1370: RV_9,077.01a eṣa pra kośe madhumāṃ acikradad indrasya vajro vapuṣo vapuṣṭaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1371: RV_9,077.01c abhīm ṛtasya sudughā ghṛtaścuto vāśrā arṣanti payaseva dhenavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1372: RV_9,077.02a sa pūrvyaḥ pavate yaṃ divas pari śyeno mathāyad iṣitas tiro rajaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1373: RV_9,077.02c sa madhva ā yuvate vevijāna it kṛśānor astur manasāha bibhyuṣā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1374: RV_9,077.03a te naḥ pūrvāsa uparāsa indavo mahe vājāya dhanvantu gomate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1375: RV_9,077.03c īkṣeṇyāso ahyo na cāravo brahma-brahma ye jujuṣur havir-haviḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1376: RV_9,077.04a ayaṃ no vidvān vanavad vanuṣyata induḥ satrācā manasā puruṣṭutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1377: RV_9,077.04c inasya yaḥ sadane garbham ādadhe gavām urubjam abhy arṣati vrajam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1378: RV_9,077.05a cakrir divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso mahāṃ adabdho varuṇo hurug yate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1379: RV_9,077.05c asāvi mitro vṛjaneṣu yajñiyo 'tyo na yūthe vṛṣayuḥ kanikradat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1380: RV_9,078.01a pra rājā vācaṃ janayann asiṣyadad apo vasāno abhi gā iyakṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1381: RV_9,078.01c gṛbhṇāti ripram avir asya tānvā śuddho devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1382: RV_9,078.02a indrāya soma pari ṣicyase nṛbhir nṛcakṣā ūrmiḥ kavir ajyase vane |
GV01rv_hn09u:1383: RV_9,078.02c pūrvīr hi te srutayaḥ santi yātave sahasram aśvā harayaś camūṣadaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1384: RV_9,078.03a samudriyā apsaraso manīṣiṇam āsīnā antar abhi somam akṣaran |
GV01rv_hn09u:1385: RV_9,078.03c tā īṃ hinvanti harmyasya sakṣaṇiṃ yācante sumnam pavamānam akṣitam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1386: RV_9,078.04a gojin naḥ somo rathajid dhiraṇyajit svarjid abjit pavate sahasrajit |
GV01rv_hn09u:1387: RV_9,078.04c yaṃ devāsaś cakrire pītaye madaṃ svādiṣṭhaṃ drapsam aruṇam mayobhuvam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1388: RV_9,078.05a etāni soma pavamāno asmayuḥ satyāni kṛṇvan draviṇāny arṣasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1389: RV_9,078.05c jahi śatrum antike dūrake ca ya urvīṃ gavyūtim abhayaṃ ca nas kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1390: RV_9,079.01a acodaso no dhanvantv indavaḥ pra suvānāso bṛhaddiveṣu harayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1391: RV_9,079.01c vi ca naśan na iṣo arātayo 'ryo naśanta saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1392: RV_9,079.02a pra ṇo dhanvantv indavo madacyuto dhanā vā yebhir arvato junīmasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1393: RV_9,079.02c tiro martasya kasya cit parihvṛtiṃ vayaṃ dhanāni viśvadhā bharemahi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1394: RV_9,079.03a uta svasyā arātyā arir hi ṣa utānyasyā arātyā vṛko hi ṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1395: RV_9,079.03c dhanvan na tṛṣṇā sam arīta tāṃ abhi soma jahi pavamāna durādhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1396: RV_9,079.04a divi te nābhā paramo ya ādade pṛthivyās te ruruhuḥ sānavi kṣipaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1397: RV_9,079.04c adrayas tvā bapsati gor adhi tvacy apsu tvā hastair duduhur manīṣiṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1398: RV_9,079.05a evā ta indo subhvaṃ supeśasaṃ rasaṃ tuñjanti prathamā abhiśriyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1399: RV_9,079.05c nidaṃ-nidam pavamāna ni tāriṣa āvis te śuṣmo bhavatu priyo madaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1400: RV_9,080.01a somasya dhārā pavate nṛcakṣasa ṛtena devān havate divas pari |
GV01rv_hn09u:1401: RV_9,080.01c bṛhaspate ravathenā vi didyute samudrāso na savanāni vivyacuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1402: RV_9,080.02a yaṃ tvā vājinn aghnyā abhy anūṣatāyohataṃ yonim ā rohasi dyumān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1403: RV_9,080.02c maghonām āyuḥ pratiran mahi śrava indrāya soma pavase vṛṣā madaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1404: RV_9,080.03a endrasya kukṣā pavate madintama ūrjaṃ vasānaḥ śravase sumaṅgalaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1405: RV_9,080.03c pratyaṅ sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paprathe krīḷan harir atyaḥ syandate vṛṣā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1406: RV_9,080.04a taṃ tvā devebhyo madhumattamaṃ naraḥ sahasradhāraṃ duhate daśa kṣipaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1407: RV_9,080.04c nṛbhiḥ soma pracyuto grāvabhiḥ suto viśvān devāṃ ā pavasvā sahasrajit ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1408: RV_9,080.05a taṃ tvā hastino madhumantam adribhir duhanty apsu vṛṣabhaṃ daśa kṣipaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1409: RV_9,080.05c indraṃ soma mādayan daivyaṃ janaṃ sindhor ivormiḥ pavamāno arṣasi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1410: RV_9,081.01a pra somasya pavamānasyormaya indrasya yanti jaṭharaṃ supeśasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1411: RV_9,081.01c dadhnā yad īm unnītā yaśasā gavāṃ dānāya śūram udamandiṣuḥ sutāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1412: RV_9,081.02a acchā hi somaḥ kalaśāṃ asiṣyadad atyo na voḷhā raghuvartanir vṛṣā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1413: RV_9,081.02c athā devānām ubhayasya janmano vidvāṃ aśnoty amuta itaś ca yat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1414: RV_9,081.03a ā naḥ soma pavamānaḥ kirā vasv indo bhava maghavā rādhaso mahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1415: RV_9,081.03c śikṣā vayodho vasave su cetunā mā no gayam āre asmat parā sicaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1416: RV_9,081.04a ā naḥ pūṣā pavamānaḥ surātayo mitro gacchantu varuṇaḥ sajoṣasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1417: RV_9,081.04c bṛhaspatir maruto vāyur aśvinā tvaṣṭā savitā suyamā sarasvatī ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1418: RV_9,081.05a ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminve aryamā devo aditir vidhātā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1419: RV_9,081.05c bhago nṛśaṃsa urv antarikṣaṃ viśve devāḥ pavamānaṃ juṣanta ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1420: RV_9,082.01a asāvi somo aruṣo vṛṣā harī rājeva dasmo abhi gā acikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1421: RV_9,082.01c punāno vāram pary ety avyayaṃ śyeno na yoniṃ ghṛtavantam āsadam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1422: RV_9,082.02a kavir vedhasyā pary eṣi māhinam atyo na mṛṣṭo abhi vājam arṣasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1423: RV_9,082.02c apasedhan duritā soma mṛḷaya ghṛtaṃ vasānaḥ pari yāsi nirṇijam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1424: RV_9,082.03a parjanyaḥ pitā mahiṣasya parṇino nābhā pṛthivyā giriṣu kṣayaṃ dadhe |
GV01rv_hn09u:1425: RV_9,082.03c svasāra āpo abhi gā utāsaran saṃ grāvabhir nasate vīte adhvare ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1426: RV_9,082.04a jāyeva patyāv adhi śeva maṃhase pajrāyā garbha śṛṇuhi bravīmi te |
GV01rv_hn09u:1427: RV_9,082.04c antar vāṇīṣu pra carā su jīvase 'nindyo vṛjane soma jāgṛhi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1428: RV_9,082.05a yathā pūrvebhyaḥ śatasā amṛdhraḥ sahasrasāḥ paryayā vājam indo |
GV01rv_hn09u:1429: RV_9,082.05c evā pavasva suvitāya navyase tava vratam anv āpaḥ sacante ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1430: RV_9,083.01a pavitraṃ te vitatam brahmaṇas pate prabhur gātrāṇi pary eṣi viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1431: RV_9,083.01c ataptatanūr na tad āmo aśnute śṛtāsa id vahantas tat sam āśata ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1432: RV_9,083.02a tapoṣ pavitraṃ vitataṃ divas pade śocanto asya tantavo vy asthiran |
GV01rv_hn09u:1433: RV_9,083.02c avanty asya pavītāram āśavo divas pṛṣṭham adhi tiṣṭhanti cetasā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1434: RV_9,083.03a arūrucad uṣasaḥ pṛśnir agriya ukṣā bibharti bhuvanāni vājayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1435: RV_9,083.03c māyāvino mamire asya māyayā nṛcakṣasaḥ pitaro garbham ā dadhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1436: RV_9,083.04a gandharva itthā padam asya rakṣati pāti devānāṃ janimāny adbhutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1437: RV_9,083.04c gṛbhṇāti ripuṃ nidhayā nidhāpatiḥ sukṛttamā madhuno bhakṣam āśata ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1438: RV_9,083.05a havir haviṣmo mahi sadma daivyaṃ nabho vasānaḥ pari yāsy adhvaram |
GV01rv_hn09u:1439: RV_9,083.05c rājā pavitraratho vājam āruhaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭir jayasi śravo bṛhat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1440: RV_9,084.01a pavasva devamādano vicarṣaṇir apsā indrāya varuṇāya vāyave |
GV01rv_hn09u:1441: RV_9,084.01c kṛdhī no adya varivaḥ svastimad urukṣitau gṛṇīhi daivyaṃ janam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1442: RV_9,084.02a ā yas tasthau bhuvanāny amartyo viśvāni somaḥ pari tāny arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1443: RV_9,084.02c kṛṇvan saṃcṛtaṃ vicṛtam abhiṣṭaya induḥ siṣakty uṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1444: RV_9,084.03a ā yo gobhiḥ sṛjyata oṣadhīṣv ā devānāṃ sumna iṣayann upāvasuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1445: RV_9,084.03c ā vidyutā pavate dhārayā suta indraṃ somo mādayan daivyaṃ janam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1446: RV_9,084.04a eṣa sya somaḥ pavate sahasrajid dhinvāno vācam iṣirām uṣarbudham |
GV01rv_hn09u:1447: RV_9,084.04c induḥ samudram ud iyarti vāyubhir endrasya hārdi kalaśeṣu sīdati ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1448: RV_9,084.05a abhi tyaṃ gāvaḥ payasā payovṛdhaṃ somaṃ śrīṇanti matibhiḥ svarvidam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1449: RV_9,084.05c dhanañjayaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso vipraḥ kaviḥ kāvyenā svarcanāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1450: RV_9,085.01a indrāya soma suṣutaḥ pari sravāpāmīvā bhavatu rakṣasā saha |
GV01rv_hn09u:1451: RV_9,085.01c mā te rasasya matsata dvayāvino draviṇasvanta iha santv indavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1452: RV_9,085.02a asmān samarye pavamāna codaya dakṣo devānām asi hi priyo madaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1453: RV_9,085.02c jahi śatrūṃr abhy ā bhandanāyataḥ pibendra somam ava no mṛdho jahi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1454: RV_9,085.03a adabdha indo pavase madintama ātmendrasya bhavasi dhāsir uttamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1455: RV_9,085.03c abhi svaranti bahavo manīṣiṇo rājānam asya bhuvanasya niṃsate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1456: RV_9,085.04a sahasraṇīthaḥ śatadhāro adbhuta indrāyenduḥ pavate kāmyam madhu |
GV01rv_hn09u:1457: RV_9,085.04c jayan kṣetram abhy arṣā jayann apa uruṃ no gātuṃ kṛṇu soma mīḍhvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1458: RV_9,085.05a kanikradat kalaśe gobhir ajyase vy avyayaṃ samayā vāram arṣasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1459: RV_9,085.05c marmṛjyamāno atyo na sānasir indrasya soma jaṭhare sam akṣaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1460: RV_9,085.06a svāduḥ pavasva divyāya janmane svādur indrāya suhavītunāmne |
GV01rv_hn09u:1461: RV_9,085.06c svādur mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave bṛhaspataye madhumāṃ adābhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1462: RV_9,085.07a atyam mṛjanti kalaśe daśa kṣipaḥ pra viprāṇām matayo vāca īrate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1463: RV_9,085.07c pavamānā abhy arṣanti suṣṭutim endraṃ viśanti madirāsa indavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1464: RV_9,085.08a pavamāno abhy arṣā suvīryam urvīṃ gavyūtim mahi śarma saprathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1465: RV_9,085.08c mākir no asya pariṣūtir īśatendo jayema tvayā dhanaṃ-dhanam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1466: RV_9,085.09a adhi dyām asthād vṛṣabho vicakṣaṇo 'rūrucad vi divo rocanā kaviḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1467: RV_9,085.09c rājā pavitram aty eti roruvad divaḥ pīyūṣaṃ duhate nṛcakṣasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1468: RV_9,085.10a divo nāke madhujihvā asaścato venā duhanty ukṣaṇaṃ giriṣṭhām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1469: RV_9,085.10c apsu drapsaṃ vāvṛdhānaṃ samudra ā sindhor ūrmā madhumantam pavitra ā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1470: RV_9,085.11a nāke suparṇam upapaptivāṃsaṃ giro venānām akṛpanta pūrvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1471: RV_9,085.11c śiśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnataṃ hiraṇyayaṃ śakunaṃ kṣāmaṇi sthām ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1472: RV_9,085.12a ūrdhvo gandharvo adhi nāke asthād viśvā rūpā praticakṣāṇo asya |
GV01rv_hn09u:1473: RV_9,085.12c bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā vy adyaut prārūrucad rodasī mātarā śuciḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1474: RV_9,086.01a pra ta āśavaḥ pavamāna dhījavo madā arṣanti raghujā iva tmanā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1475: RV_9,086.01c divyāḥ suparṇā madhumanta indavo madintamāsaḥ pari kośam āsate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1476: RV_9,086.02a pra te madāso madirāsa āśavo 'sṛkṣata rathyāso yathā pṛthak |
GV01rv_hn09u:1477: RV_9,086.02c dhenur na vatsam payasābhi vajriṇam indram indavo madhumanta ūrmayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1478: RV_9,086.03a atyo na hiyāno abhi vājam arṣa svarvit kośaṃ divo adrimātaram |
GV01rv_hn09u:1479: RV_9,086.03c vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avyaye somaḥ punāna indriyāya dhāyase ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1480: RV_9,086.04a pra ta āśvinīḥ pavamāna dhījuvo divyā asṛgran payasā dharīmaṇi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1481: RV_9,086.04c prāntar ṛṣaya sthāvirīr asṛkṣata ye tvā mṛjanty ṛṣiṣāṇa vedhasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1482: RV_9,086.05a viśvā dhāmāni viśvacakṣa ṛbhvasaḥ prabhos te sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1483: RV_9,086.05c vyānaśiḥ pavase soma dharmabhiḥ patir viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1484: RV_9,086.06a ubhayataḥ pavamānasya raśmayo dhruvasya sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1485: RV_9,086.06c yadī pavitre adhi mṛjyate hariḥ sattā ni yonā kalaśeṣu sīdati ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1486: RV_9,086.07a yajñasya ketuḥ pavate svadhvaraḥ somo devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1487: RV_9,086.07c sahasradhāraḥ pari kośam arṣati vṛṣā pavitram aty eti roruvat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1488: RV_9,086.08a rājā samudraṃ nadyo vi gāhate 'pām ūrmiṃ sacate sindhuṣu śritaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1489: RV_9,086.08c adhy asthāt sānu pavamāno avyayaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā dharuṇo maho divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1490: RV_9,086.09a divo na sānu stanayann acikradad dyauś ca yasya pṛthivī ca dharmabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1491: RV_9,086.09c indrasya sakhyam pavate vivevidat somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1492: RV_9,086.10a jyotir yajñasya pavate madhu priyam pitā devānāṃ janitā vibhūvasuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1493: RV_9,086.10c dadhāti ratnaṃ svadhayor apīcyam madintamo matsara indriyo rasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1494: RV_9,086.11a abhikrandan kalaśaṃ vājy arṣati patir divaḥ śatadhāro vicakṣaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1495: RV_9,086.11c harir mitrasya sadaneṣu sīdati marmṛjāno 'vibhiḥ sindhubhir vṛṣā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1496: RV_9,086.12a agre sindhūnām pavamāno arṣaty agre vāco agriyo goṣu gacchati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1497: RV_9,086.12c agre vājasya bhajate mahādhanaṃ svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyate vṛṣā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1498: RV_9,086.13a ayam matavāñ chakuno yathā hito 'vye sasāra pavamāna ūrmiṇā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1499: RV_9,086.13c tava kratvā rodasī antarā kave śucir dhiyā pavate soma indra te ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1500: RV_9,086.14a drāpiṃ vasāno yajato divispṛśam antarikṣaprā bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1501: RV_9,086.14c svar jajñāno nabhasābhy akramīt pratnam asya pitaram ā vivāsati ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1502: RV_9,086.15a so asya viśe mahi śarma yacchati yo asya dhāma prathamaṃ vyānaśe |
GV01rv_hn09u:1503: RV_9,086.15c padaṃ yad asya parame vyomany ato viśvā abhi saṃ yāti saṃyataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1504: RV_9,086.16a pro ayāsīd indur indrasya niṣkṛtaṃ sakhā sakhyur na pra mināti saṃgiram |
GV01rv_hn09u:1505: RV_9,086.16c marya iva yuvatibhiḥ sam arṣati somaḥ kalaśe śatayāmnā pathā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1506: RV_9,086.17a pra vo dhiyo mandrayuvo vipanyuvaḥ panasyuvaḥ saṃvasaneṣv akramuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1507: RV_9,086.17c somam manīṣā abhy anūṣata stubho 'bhi dhenavaḥ payasem aśiśrayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1508: RV_9,086.18a ā naḥ soma saṃyatam pipyuṣīm iṣam indo pavasva pavamāno asridham |
GV01rv_hn09u:1509: RV_9,086.18c yā no dohate trir ahann asaścuṣī kṣumad vājavan madhumat suvīryam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1510: RV_9,086.19a vṛṣā matīnām pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ somo ahnaḥ pratarītoṣaso divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1511: RV_9,086.19c krāṇā sindhūnāṃ kalaśāṃ avīvaśad indrasya hārdy āviśan manīṣibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1512: RV_9,086.20a manīṣibhiḥ pavate pūrvyaḥ kavir nṛbhir yataḥ pari kośāṃ acikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1513: RV_9,086.20c tritasya nāma janayan madhu kṣarad indrasya vāyoḥ sakhyāya kartave ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1514: RV_9,086.21a ayam punāna uṣaso vi rocayad ayaṃ sindhubhyo abhavad u lokakṛt |
GV01rv_hn09u:1515: RV_9,086.21c ayaṃ triḥ sapta duduhāna āśiraṃ somo hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1516: RV_9,086.22a pavasva soma divyeṣu dhāmasu sṛjāna indo kalaśe pavitra ā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1517: RV_9,086.22c sīdann indrasya jaṭhare kanikradan nṛbhir yataḥ sūryam ārohayo divi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1518: RV_9,086.23a adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavase pavitra āṃ indav indrasya jaṭhareṣv āviśan |
GV01rv_hn09u:1519: RV_9,086.23c tvaṃ nṛcakṣā abhavo vicakṣaṇa soma gotram aṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇor apa ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1520: RV_9,086.24a tvāṃ soma pavamānaṃ svādhyo 'nu viprāso amadann avasyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1521: RV_9,086.24c tvāṃ suparṇa ābharad divas parīndo viśvābhir matibhiḥ pariṣkṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1522: RV_9,086.25a avye punānam pari vāra ūrmiṇā hariṃ navante abhi sapta dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1523: RV_9,086.25c apām upasthe adhy āyavaḥ kavim ṛtasya yonā mahiṣā aheṣata ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1524: RV_9,086.26a induḥ punāno ati gāhate mṛdho viśvāni kṛṇvan supathāni yajyave |
GV01rv_hn09u:1525: RV_9,086.26c gāḥ kṛṇvāno nirṇijaṃ haryataḥ kavir atyo na krīḷan pari vāram arṣati ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1526: RV_9,086.27a asaścataḥ śatadhārā abhiśriyo hariṃ navante 'va tā udanyuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1527: RV_9,086.27c kṣipo mṛjanti pari gobhir āvṛtaṃ tṛtīye pṛṣṭhe adhi rocane divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1528: RV_9,086.28a tavemāḥ prajā divyasya retasas tvaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1529: RV_9,086.28c athedaṃ viśvam pavamāna te vaśe tvam indo prathamo dhāmadhā asi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1530: RV_9,086.29a tvaṃ samudro asi viśvavit kave tavemāḥ pañca pradiśo vidharmaṇi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1531: RV_9,086.29c tvaṃ dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāti jabhriṣe tava jyotīṃṣi pavamāna sūryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1532: RV_9,086.30a tvam pavitre rajaso vidharmaṇi devebhyaḥ soma pavamāna pūyase |
GV01rv_hn09u:1533: RV_9,086.30c tvām uśijaḥ prathamā agṛbhṇata tubhyemā viśvā bhuvanāni yemire ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1534: RV_9,086.31a pra rebha ety ati vāram avyayaṃ vṛṣā vaneṣv ava cakradad dhariḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1535: RV_9,086.31c saṃ dhītayo vāvaśānā anūṣata śiśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1536: RV_9,086.32a sa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ pari vyata tantuṃ tanvānas trivṛtaṃ yathā vide |
GV01rv_hn09u:1537: RV_9,086.32c nayann ṛtasya praśiṣo navīyasīḥ patir janīnām upa yāti niṣkṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1538: RV_9,086.33a rājā sindhūnām pavate patir diva ṛtasya yāti pathibhiḥ kanikradat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1539: RV_9,086.33c sahasradhāraḥ pari ṣicyate hariḥ punāno vācaṃ janayann upāvasuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1540: RV_9,086.34a pavamāna mahy arṇo vi dhāvasi sūro na citro avyayāni pavyayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1541: RV_9,086.34c gabhastipūto nṛbhir adribhiḥ suto mahe vājāya dhanyāya dhanvasi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1542: RV_9,086.35a iṣam ūrjam pavamānābhy arṣasi śyeno na vaṃsu kalaśeṣu sīdasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1543: RV_9,086.35c indrāya madvā madyo madaḥ suto divo viṣṭambha upamo vicakṣaṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1544: RV_9,086.36a sapta svasāro abhi mātaraḥ śiśuṃ navaṃ jajñānaṃ jenyaṃ vipaścitam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1545: RV_9,086.36c apāṃ gandharvaṃ divyaṃ nṛcakṣasaṃ somaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājase ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1546: RV_9,086.37a īśāna imā bhuvanāni vīyase yujāna indo haritaḥ suparṇyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1547: RV_9,086.37c tās te kṣarantu madhumad ghṛtam payas tava vrate soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1548: RV_9,086.38a tvaṃ nṛcakṣā asi soma viśvataḥ pavamāna vṛṣabha tā vi dhāvasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1549: RV_9,086.38c sa naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavad vayaṃ syāma bhuvaneṣu jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1550: RV_9,086.39a govit pavasva vasuvid dhiraṇyavid retodhā indo bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1551: RV_9,086.39c tvaṃ suvīro asi soma viśvavit taṃ tvā viprā upa girema āsate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1552: RV_9,086.40a un madhva ūrmir vananā atiṣṭhipad apo vasāno mahiṣo vi gāhate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1553: RV_9,086.40c rājā pavitraratho vājam āruhat sahasrabhṛṣṭir jayati śravo bṛhat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1554: RV_9,086.41a sa bhandanā ud iyarti prajāvatīr viśvāyur viśvāḥ subharā ahardivi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1555: RV_9,086.41c brahma prajāvad rayim aśvapastyam pīta indav indram asmabhyaṃ yācatāt ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1556: RV_9,086.42a so agre ahnāṃ harir haryato madaḥ pra cetasā cetayate anu dyubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1557: RV_9,086.42c dvā janā yātayann antar īyate narā ca śaṃsaṃ daivyaṃ ca dhartari ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1558: RV_9,086.43a añjate vy añjate sam añjate kratuṃ rihanti madhunābhy añjate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1559: RV_9,086.43c sindhor ucchvāse patayantam ukṣaṇaṃ hiraṇyapāvāḥ paśum āsu gṛbhṇate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1560: RV_9,086.44a vipaścite pavamānāya gāyata mahī na dhārāty andho arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1561: RV_9,086.44c ahir na jūrṇām ati sarpati tvacam atyo na krīḷann asarad vṛṣā hariḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1562: RV_9,086.45a agrego rājāpyas taviṣyate vimāno ahnām bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1563: RV_9,086.45c harir ghṛtasnuḥ sudṛśīko arṇavo jyotīrathaḥ pavate rāya okyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1564: RV_9,086.46a asarji skambho diva udyato madaḥ pari tridhātur bhuvanāny arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1565: RV_9,086.46c aṃśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnataṃ girā yadi nirṇijam ṛgmiṇo yayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1566: RV_9,086.47a pra te dhārā aty aṇvāni meṣyaḥ punānasya saṃyato yanti raṃhayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1567: RV_9,086.47c yad gobhir indo camvoḥ samajyasa ā suvānaḥ soma kalaśeṣu sīdasi ||
