GV01rv_hn09u:1568: RV_9,086.48a pavasva soma kratuvin na ukthyo 'vyo vāre pari dhāva madhu priyam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1569: RV_9,086.48c jahi viśvān rakṣasa indo atriṇo bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1570: RV_9,087.01a pra tu drava pari kośaṃ ni ṣīda nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vājam arṣa |
GV01rv_hn09u:1571: RV_9,087.01c aśvaṃ na tvā vājinam marjayanto 'cchā barhī raśanābhir nayanti ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1572: RV_9,087.02a svāyudhaḥ pavate deva indur aśastihā vṛjanaṃ rakṣamāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1573: RV_9,087.02c pitā devānāṃ janitā sudakṣo viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1574: RV_9,087.03a ṛṣir vipraḥ puraetā janānām ṛbhur dhīra uśanā kāvyena |
GV01rv_hn09u:1575: RV_9,087.03c sa cid viveda nihitaṃ yad āsām apīcyaṃ guhyaṃ nāma gonām ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1576: RV_9,087.04a eṣa sya te madhumāṃ indra somo vṛṣā vṛṣṇe pari pavitre akṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1577: RV_9,087.04c sahasrasāḥ śatasā bhūridāvā śaśvattamam barhir ā vājy asthāt ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1578: RV_9,087.05a ete somā abhi gavyā sahasrā mahe vājāyāmṛtāya śravāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1579: RV_9,087.05c pavitrebhiḥ pavamānā asṛgrañ chravasyavo na pṛtanājo atyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1580: RV_9,087.06a pari hi ṣmā puruhūto janānāṃ viśvāsarad bhojanā pūyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1581: RV_9,087.06c athā bhara śyenabhṛta prayāṃsi rayiṃ tuñjāno abhi vājam arṣa ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1582: RV_9,087.07a eṣa suvānaḥ pari somaḥ pavitre sargo na sṛṣṭo adadhāvad arvā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1583: RV_9,087.07c tigme śiśāno mahiṣo na śṛṅge gā gavyann abhi śūro na satvā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1584: RV_9,087.08a eṣā yayau paramād antar adreḥ kūcit satīr ūrve gā viveda |
GV01rv_hn09u:1585: RV_9,087.08c divo na vidyut stanayanty abhraiḥ somasya te pavata indra dhārā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1586: RV_9,087.09a uta sma rāśim pari yāsi gonām indreṇa soma saratham punānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1587: RV_9,087.09c pūrvīr iṣo bṛhatīr jīradāno śikṣā śacīvas tava tā upaṣṭut ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1588: RV_9,088.01a ayaṃ soma indra tubhyaṃ sunve tubhyam pavate tvam asya pāhi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1589: RV_9,088.01c tvaṃ ha yaṃ cakṛṣe tvaṃ vavṛṣa indum madāya yujyāya somam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1590: RV_9,088.02a sa īṃ ratho na bhuriṣāḷ ayoji mahaḥ purūṇi sātaye vasūni |
GV01rv_hn09u:1591: RV_9,088.02c ād īṃ viśvā nahuṣyāṇi jātā svarṣātā vana ūrdhvā navanta ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1592: RV_9,088.03a vāyur na yo niyutvāṃ iṣṭayāmā nāsatyeva hava ā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1593: RV_9,088.03c viśvavāro draviṇodā iva tman pūṣeva dhījavano 'si soma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1594: RV_9,088.04a indro na yo mahā karmāṇi cakrir hantā vṛtrāṇām asi soma pūrbhit |
GV01rv_hn09u:1595: RV_9,088.04c paidvo na hi tvam ahināmnāṃ hantā viśvasyāsi soma dasyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1596: RV_9,088.05a agnir na yo vana ā sṛjyamāno vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣu |
GV01rv_hn09u:1597: RV_9,088.05c jano na yudhvā mahata upabdir iyarti somaḥ pavamāna ūrmim ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1598: RV_9,088.06a ete somā ati vārāṇy avyā divyā na kośāso abhravarṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1599: RV_9,088.06c vṛthā samudraṃ sindhavo na nīcīḥ sutāso abhi kalaśāṃ asṛgran ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1600: RV_9,088.07a śuṣmī śardho na mārutam pavasvānabhiśastā divyā yathā viṭ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1601: RV_9,088.07c āpo na makṣū sumatir bhavā naḥ sahasrāpsāḥ pṛtanāṣāṇ na yajñaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1602: RV_9,088.08a rājño nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhad gabhīraṃ tava soma dhāma |
GV01rv_hn09u:1603: RV_9,088.08c śuciṣ ṭvam asi priyo na mitro dakṣāyyo aryamevāsi soma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1604: RV_9,089.01a pro sya vahniḥ pathyābhir asyān divo na vṛṣṭiḥ pavamāno akṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1605: RV_9,089.01c sahasradhāro asadan ny asme mātur upasthe vana ā ca somaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1606: RV_9,089.02a rājā sindhūnām avasiṣṭa vāsa ṛtasya nāvam āruhad rajiṣṭhām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1607: RV_9,089.02c apsu drapso vāvṛdhe śyenajūto duha īm pitā duha īm pitur jām ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1608: RV_9,089.03a siṃhaṃ nasanta madhvo ayāsaṃ harim aruṣaṃ divo asya patim |
GV01rv_hn09u:1609: RV_9,089.03c śūro yutsu prathamaḥ pṛcchate gā asya cakṣasā pari pāty ukṣā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1610: RV_9,089.04a madhupṛṣṭhaṃ ghoram ayāsam aśvaṃ rathe yuñjanty urucakra ṛṣvam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1611: RV_9,089.04c svasāra īṃ jāmayo marjayanti sanābhayo vājinam ūrjayanti ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1612: RV_9,089.05a catasra īṃ ghṛtaduhaḥ sacante samāne antar dharuṇe niṣattāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1613: RV_9,089.05c tā īm arṣanti namasā punānās tā īṃ viśvataḥ pari ṣanti pūrvīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1614: RV_9,089.06a viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyā viśvā uta kṣitayo haste asya |
GV01rv_hn09u:1615: RV_9,089.06c asat ta utso gṛṇate niyutvān madhvo aṃśuḥ pavata indriyāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1616: RV_9,089.07a vanvann avāto abhi devavītim indrāya soma vṛtrahā pavasva |
GV01rv_hn09u:1617: RV_9,089.07c śagdhi mahaḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1618: RV_9,090.01a pra hinvāno janitā rodasyo ratho na vājaṃ saniṣyann ayāsīt |
GV01rv_hn09u:1619: RV_9,090.01c indraṃ gacchann āyudhā saṃśiśāno viśvā vasu hastayor ādadhānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1620: RV_9,090.02a abhi tripṛṣṭhaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vayodhām āṅgūṣāṇām avāvaśanta vāṇīḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1621: RV_9,090.02c vanā vasāno varuṇo na sindhūn vi ratnadhā dayate vāryāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1622: RV_9,090.03a śūragrāmaḥ sarvavīraḥ sahāvāñ jetā pavasva sanitā dhanāni |
GV01rv_hn09u:1623: RV_9,090.03c tigmāyudhaḥ kṣipradhanvā samatsv aṣāḷhaḥ sāhvān pṛtanāsu śatrūn ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1624: RV_9,090.04a urugavyūtir abhayāni kṛṇvan samīcīne ā pavasvā purandhī |
GV01rv_hn09u:1625: RV_9,090.04c apaḥ siṣāsann uṣasaḥ svar gāḥ saṃ cikrado maho asmabhyaṃ vājān ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1626: RV_9,090.05a matsi soma varuṇam matsi mitram matsīndram indo pavamāna viṣṇum |
GV01rv_hn09u:1627: RV_9,090.05c matsi śardho mārutam matsi devān matsi mahām indram indo madāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1628: RV_9,090.06a evā rājeva kratumāṃ amena viśvā ghanighnad duritā pavasva |
GV01rv_hn09u:1629: RV_9,090.06c indo sūktāya vacase vayo dhā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1630: RV_9,091.01a asarji vakvā rathye yathājau dhiyā manotā prathamo manīṣī |
GV01rv_hn09u:1631: RV_9,091.01c daśa svasāro adhi sāno avye 'janti vahniṃ sadanāny accha ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1632: RV_9,091.02a vītī janasya divyasya kavyair adhi suvāno nahuṣyebhir induḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1633: RV_9,091.02c pra yo nṛbhir amṛto martyebhir marmṛjāno 'vibhir gobhir adbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1634: RV_9,091.03a vṛṣā vṛṣṇe roruvad aṃśur asmai pavamāno ruśad īrte payo goḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1635: RV_9,091.03c sahasram ṛkvā pathibhir vacovid adhvasmabhiḥ sūro aṇvaṃ vi yāti ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1636: RV_9,091.04a rujā dṛḷhā cid rakṣasaḥ sadāṃsi punāna inda ūrṇuhi vi vājān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1637: RV_9,091.04c vṛścopariṣṭāt tujatā vadhena ye anti dūrād upanāyam eṣām ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1638: RV_9,091.05a sa pratnavan navyase viśvavāra sūktāya pathaḥ kṛṇuhi prācaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1639: RV_9,091.05c ye duḥṣahāso vanuṣā bṛhantas tāṃs te aśyāma purukṛt purukṣo ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1640: RV_9,091.06a evā punāno apaḥ svar gā asmabhyaṃ tokā tanayāni bhūri |
GV01rv_hn09u:1641: RV_9,091.06c śaṃ naḥ kṣetram uru jyotīṃṣi soma jyoṅ naḥ sūryaṃ dṛśaye rirīhi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1642: RV_9,092.01a pari suvāno harir aṃśuḥ pavitre ratho na sarji sanaye hiyānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1643: RV_9,092.01c āpac chlokam indriyam pūyamānaḥ prati devāṃ ajuṣata prayobhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1644: RV_9,092.02a acchā nṛcakṣā asarat pavitre nāma dadhānaḥ kavir asya yonau |
GV01rv_hn09u:1645: RV_9,092.02c sīdan hoteva sadane camūṣūpem agmann ṛṣayaḥ sapta viprāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1646: RV_9,092.03a pra sumedhā gātuvid viśvadevaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ sada eti nityam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1647: RV_9,092.03c bhuvad viśveṣu kāvyeṣu rantānu janān yatate pañca dhīraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1648: RV_9,092.04a tava tye soma pavamāna niṇye viśve devās traya ekādaśāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1649: RV_9,092.04c daśa svadhābhir adhi sāno avye mṛjanti tvā nadyaḥ sapta yahvīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1650: RV_9,092.05a tan nu satyam pavamānasyāstu yatra viśve kāravaḥ saṃnasanta |
GV01rv_hn09u:1651: RV_9,092.05c jyotir yad ahne akṛṇod u lokam prāvan manuṃ dasyave kar abhīkam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1652: RV_9,092.06a pari sadmeva paśumānti hotā rājā na satyaḥ samitīr iyānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1653: RV_9,092.06c somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśāṃ ayāsīt sīdan mṛgo na mahiṣo vaneṣu ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1654: RV_9,093.01a sākamukṣo marjayanta svasāro daśa dhīrasya dhītayo dhanutrīḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1655: RV_9,093.01c hariḥ pary adravaj jāḥ sūryasya droṇaṃ nanakṣe atyo na vājī ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1656: RV_9,093.02a sam mātṛbhir na śiśur vāvaśāno vṛṣā dadhanve puruvāro adbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1657: RV_9,093.02c maryo na yoṣām abhi niṣkṛtaṃ yan saṃ gacchate kalaśa usriyābhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1658: RV_9,093.03a uta pra pipya ūdhar aghnyāyā indur dhārābhiḥ sacate sumedhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1659: RV_9,093.03c mūrdhānaṃ gāvaḥ payasā camūṣv abhi śrīṇanti vasubhir na niktaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1660: RV_9,093.04a sa no devebhiḥ pavamāna radendo rayim aśvinaṃ vāvaśānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1661: RV_9,093.04c rathirāyatām uśatī purandhir asmadryag ā dāvane vasūnām ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1662: RV_9,093.05a nū no rayim upa māsva nṛvantam punāno vātāpyaṃ viśvaścandram |
GV01rv_hn09u:1663: RV_9,093.05c pra vanditur indo tāry āyuḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1664: RV_9,094.01a adhi yad asmin vājinīva śubha spardhante dhiyaḥ sūrye na viśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1665: RV_9,094.01c apo vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyan vrajaṃ na paśuvardhanāya manma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1666: RV_9,094.02a dvitā vyūrṇvann amṛtasya dhāma svarvide bhuvanāni prathanta |
GV01rv_hn09u:1667: RV_9,094.02c dhiyaḥ pinvānāḥ svasare na gāva ṛtāyantīr abhi vāvaśra indum ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1668: RV_9,094.03a pari yat kaviḥ kāvyā bharate śūro na ratho bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1669: RV_9,094.03c deveṣu yaśo martāya bhūṣan dakṣāya rāyaḥ purubhūṣu navyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1670: RV_9,094.04a śriye jātaḥ śriya ā nir iyāya śriyaṃ vayo jaritṛbhyo dadhāti |
GV01rv_hn09u:1671: RV_9,094.04c śriyaṃ vasānā amṛtatvam āyan bhavanti satyā samithā mitadrau ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1672: RV_9,094.05a iṣam ūrjam abhy arṣāśvaṃ gām uru jyotiḥ kṛṇuhi matsi devān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1673: RV_9,094.05c viśvāni hi suṣahā tāni tubhyam pavamāna bādhase soma śatrūn ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1674: RV_9,095.01a kanikranti harir ā sṛjyamānaḥ sīdan vanasya jaṭhare punānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1675: RV_9,095.01c nṛbhir yataḥ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ gā ato matīr janayata svadhābhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1676: RV_9,095.02a hariḥ sṛjānaḥ pathyām ṛtasyeyarti vācam ariteva nāvam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1677: RV_9,095.02c devo devānāṃ guhyāni nāmāviṣ kṛṇoti barhiṣi pravāce ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1678: RV_9,095.03a apām ived ūrmayas tarturāṇāḥ pra manīṣā īrate somam accha |
GV01rv_hn09u:1679: RV_9,095.03c namasyantīr upa ca yanti saṃ cā ca viśanty uśatīr uśantam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1680: RV_9,095.04a tam marmṛjānam mahiṣaṃ na sānāv aṃśuṃ duhanty ukṣaṇaṃ giriṣṭhām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1681: RV_9,095.04c taṃ vāvaśānam matayaḥ sacante trito bibharti varuṇaṃ samudre ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1682: RV_9,095.05a iṣyan vācam upavakteva hotuḥ punāna indo vi ṣyā manīṣām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1683: RV_9,095.05c indraś ca yat kṣayathaḥ saubhagāya suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1684: RV_9,096.01a pra senānīḥ śūro agre rathānāṃ gavyann eti harṣate asya senā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1685: RV_9,096.01c bhadrān kṛṇvann indrahavān sakhibhya ā somo vastrā rabhasāni datte ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1686: RV_9,096.02a sam asya hariṃ harayo mṛjanty aśvahayair aniśitaṃ namobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1687: RV_9,096.02c ā tiṣṭhati ratham indrasya sakhā vidvāṃ enā sumatiṃ yāty accha ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1688: RV_9,096.03a sa no deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarasa indrapānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1689: RV_9,096.03c kṛṇvann apo varṣayan dyām utemām uror ā no varivasyā punānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1690: RV_9,096.04a ajītaye 'hataye pavasva svastaye sarvatātaye bṛhate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1691: RV_9,096.04c tad uśanti viśva ime sakhāyas tad ahaṃ vaśmi pavamāna soma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1692: RV_9,096.05a somaḥ pavate janitā matīnāṃ janitā divo janitā pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1693: RV_9,096.05c janitāgner janitā sūryasya janitendrasya janitota viṣṇoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1694: RV_9,096.06a brahmā devānām padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣir viprāṇām mahiṣo mṛgāṇām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1695: RV_9,096.06c śyeno gṛdhrāṇāṃ svadhitir vanānāṃ somaḥ pavitram aty eti rebhan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1696: RV_9,096.07a prāvīvipad vāca ūrmiṃ na sindhur giraḥ somaḥ pavamāno manīṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1697: RV_9,096.07c antaḥ paśyan vṛjanemāvarāṇy ā tiṣṭhati vṛṣabho goṣu jānan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1698: RV_9,096.08a sa matsaraḥ pṛtsu vanvann avātaḥ sahasraretā abhi vājam arṣa |
GV01rv_hn09u:1699: RV_9,096.08c indrāyendo pavamāno manīṣy aṃśor ūrmim īraya gā iṣaṇyan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1700: RV_9,096.09a pari priyaḥ kalaśe devavāta indrāya somo raṇyo madāya |
GV01rv_hn09u:1701: RV_9,096.09c sahasradhāraḥ śatavāja indur vājī na saptiḥ samanā jigāti ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1702: RV_9,096.10a sa pūrvyo vasuvij jāyamāno mṛjāno apsu duduhāno adrau |
GV01rv_hn09u:1703: RV_9,096.10c abhiśastipā bhuvanasya rājā vidad gātum brahmaṇe pūyamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1704: RV_9,096.11a tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1705: RV_9,096.11c vanvann avātaḥ paridhīṃr aporṇu vīrebhir aśvair maghavā bhavā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1706: RV_9,096.12a yathāpavathā manave vayodhā amitrahā varivovid dhaviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1707: RV_9,096.12c evā pavasva draviṇaṃ dadhāna indre saṃ tiṣṭha janayāyudhāni ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1708: RV_9,096.13a pavasva soma madhumāṃ ṛtāvāpo vasāno adhi sāno avye |
GV01rv_hn09u:1709: RV_9,096.13c ava droṇāni ghṛtavānti sīda madintamo matsara indrapānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1710: RV_9,096.14a vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ śatadhāraḥ pavasva sahasrasā vājayur devavītau |
GV01rv_hn09u:1711: RV_9,096.14c saṃ sindhubhiḥ kalaśe vāvaśānaḥ sam usriyābhiḥ pratiran na āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1712: RV_9,096.15a eṣa sya somo matibhiḥ punāno 'tyo na vājī taratīd arātīḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1713: RV_9,096.15c payo na dugdham aditer iṣiram urv iva gātuḥ suyamo na voḷhā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1714: RV_9,096.16a svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyamāno 'bhy arṣa guhyaṃ cāru nāma |
GV01rv_hn09u:1715: RV_9,096.16c abhi vājaṃ saptir iva śravasyābhi vāyum abhi gā deva soma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1716: RV_9,096.17a śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ haryatam mṛjanti śumbhanti vahnim maruto gaṇena |
GV01rv_hn09u:1717: RV_9,096.17c kavir gīrbhiḥ kāvyenā kaviḥ san somaḥ pavitram aty eti rebhan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1718: RV_9,096.18a ṛṣimanā ya ṛṣikṛt svarṣāḥ sahasraṇīthaḥ padavīḥ kavīnām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1719: RV_9,096.18c tṛtīyaṃ dhāma mahiṣaḥ siṣāsan somo virājam anu rājati ṣṭup ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1720: RV_9,096.19a camūṣac chyenaḥ śakuno vibhṛtvā govindur drapsa āyudhāni bibhrat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1721: RV_9,096.19c apām ūrmiṃ sacamānaḥ samudraṃ turīyaṃ dhāma mahiṣo vivakti ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1722: RV_9,096.20a maryo na śubhras tanvam mṛjāno 'tyo na sṛtvā sanaye dhanānām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1723: RV_9,096.20c vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośam arṣan kanikradac camvor ā viveśa ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1724: RV_9,096.21a pavasvendo pavamāno mahobhiḥ kanikradat pari vārāṇy arṣa |
GV01rv_hn09u:1725: RV_9,096.21c krīḷañ camvor ā viśa pūyamāna indraṃ te raso madiro mamattu ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1726: RV_9,096.22a prāsya dhārā bṛhatīr asṛgrann akto gobhiḥ kalaśāṃ ā viveśa |
GV01rv_hn09u:1727: RV_9,096.22c sāma kṛṇvan sāmanyo vipaścit krandann ety abhi sakhyur na jāmim ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1728: RV_9,096.23a apaghnann eṣi pavamāna śatrūn priyāṃ na jāro abhigīta induḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1729: RV_9,096.23c sīdan vaneṣu śakuno na patvā somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sattā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1730: RV_9,096.24a ā te rucaḥ pavamānasya soma yoṣeva yanti sudughāḥ sudhārāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1731: RV_9,096.24c harir ānītaḥ puruvāro apsv acikradat kalaśe devayūnām ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1732: RV_9,097.01a asya preṣā hemanā pūyamāno devo devebhiḥ sam apṛkta rasam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1733: RV_9,097.01c sutaḥ pavitram pary eti rebhan miteva sadma paśumānti hotā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1734: RV_9,097.02a bhadrā vastrā samanyā vasāno mahān kavir nivacanāni śaṃsan |
GV01rv_hn09u:1735: RV_9,097.02c ā vacyasva camvoḥ pūyamāno vicakṣaṇo jāgṛvir devavītau ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1736: RV_9,097.03a sam u priyo mṛjyate sāno avye yaśastaro yaśasāṃ kṣaito asme |
GV01rv_hn09u:1737: RV_9,097.03c abhi svara dhanvā pūyamāno yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1738: RV_9,097.04a pra gāyatābhy arcāma devān somaṃ hinota mahate dhanāya |
GV01rv_hn09u:1739: RV_9,097.04c svāduḥ pavāte ati vāram avyam ā sīdāti kalaśaṃ devayur naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1740: RV_9,097.05a indur devānām upa sakhyam āyan sahasradhāraḥ pavate madāya |
GV01rv_hn09u:1741: RV_9,097.05c nṛbhi stavāno anu dhāma pūrvam agann indram mahate saubhagāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1742: RV_9,097.06a stotre rāye harir arṣā punāna indram mado gacchatu te bharāya |
GV01rv_hn09u:1743: RV_9,097.06c devair yāhi sarathaṃ rādho acchā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1744: RV_9,097.07a pra kāvyam uśaneva bruvāṇo devo devānāṃ janimā vivakti |
GV01rv_hn09u:1745: RV_9,097.07c mahivrataḥ śucibandhuḥ pāvakaḥ padā varāho abhy eti rebhan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1746: RV_9,097.08a pra haṃsāsas tṛpalam manyum acchāmād astaṃ vṛṣagaṇā ayāsuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1747: RV_9,097.08c āṅgūṣyam pavamānaṃ sakhāyo durmarṣaṃ sākam pra vadanti vāṇam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1748: RV_9,097.09a sa raṃhata urugāyasya jūtiṃ vṛthā krīḷantam mimate na gāvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1749: RV_9,097.09c parīṇasaṃ kṛṇute tigmaśṛṅgo divā harir dadṛśe naktam ṛjraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1750: RV_9,097.10a indur vājī pavate gonyoghā indre somaḥ saha invan madāya |
GV01rv_hn09u:1751: RV_9,097.10c hanti rakṣo bādhate pary arātīr varivaḥ kṛṇvan vṛjanasya rājā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1752: RV_9,097.11a adha dhārayā madhvā pṛcānas tiro roma pavate adridugdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1753: RV_9,097.11c indur indrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇo devo devasya matsaro madāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1754: RV_9,097.12a abhi priyāṇi pavate punāno devo devān svena rasena pṛñcan |
GV01rv_hn09u:1755: RV_9,097.12c indur dharmāṇy ṛtuthā vasāno daśa kṣipo avyata sāno avye ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1756: RV_9,097.13a vṛṣā śoṇo abhikanikradad gā nadayann eti pṛthivīm uta dyām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1757: RV_9,097.13c indrasyeva vagnur ā śṛṇva ājau pracetayann arṣati vācam emām ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1758: RV_9,097.14a rasāyyaḥ payasā pinvamāna īrayann eṣi madhumantam aṃśum |
GV01rv_hn09u:1759: RV_9,097.14c pavamānaḥ saṃtanim eṣi kṛṇvann indrāya soma pariṣicyamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1760: RV_9,097.15a evā pavasva madiro madāyodagrābhasya namayan vadhasnaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1761: RV_9,097.15c pari varṇam bharamāṇo ruśantaṃ gavyur no arṣa pari soma siktaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1762: RV_9,097.16a juṣṭvī na indo supathā sugāny urau pavasva varivāṃsi kṛṇvan |
GV01rv_hn09u:1763: RV_9,097.16c ghaneva viṣvag duritāni vighnann adhi ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1764: RV_9,097.17a vṛṣṭiṃ no arṣa divyāṃ jigatnum iḷāvatīṃ śaṅgayīṃ jīradānum |
GV01rv_hn09u:1765: RV_9,097.17c stukeva vītā dhanvā vicinvan bandhūṃr imāṃ avarāṃ indo vāyūn ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1766: RV_9,097.18a granthiṃ na vi ṣya grathitam punāna ṛjuṃ ca gātuṃ vṛjinaṃ ca soma |
GV01rv_hn09u:1767: RV_9,097.18c atyo na krado harir ā sṛjāno maryo deva dhanva pastyāvān ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1768: RV_9,097.19a juṣṭo madāya devatāta indo pari ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye |
GV01rv_hn09u:1769: RV_9,097.19c sahasradhāraḥ surabhir adabdhaḥ pari srava vājasātau nṛṣahye ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1770: RV_9,097.20a araśmāno ye 'rathā ayuktā atyāso na sasṛjānāsa ājau |
GV01rv_hn09u:1771: RV_9,097.20c ete śukrāso dhanvanti somā devāsas tāṃ upa yātā pibadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1772: RV_9,097.21a evā na indo abhi devavītim pari srava nabho arṇaś camūṣu |
GV01rv_hn09u:1773: RV_9,097.21c somo asmabhyaṃ kāmyam bṛhantaṃ rayiṃ dadātu vīravantam ugram ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1774: RV_9,097.22a takṣad yadī manaso venato vāg jyeṣṭhasya vā dharmaṇi kṣor anīke |
GV01rv_hn09u:1775: RV_9,097.22c ād īm āyan varam ā vāvaśānā juṣṭam patiṃ kalaśe gāva indum ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1776: RV_9,097.23a pra dānudo divyo dānupinva ṛtam ṛtāya pavate sumedhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1777: RV_9,097.23c dharmā bhuvad vṛjanyasya rājā pra raśmibhir daśabhir bhāri bhūma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1778: RV_9,097.24a pavitrebhiḥ pavamāno nṛcakṣā rājā devānām uta martyānām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1779: RV_9,097.24c dvitā bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām ṛtam bharat subhṛtaṃ cārv induḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1780: RV_9,097.25a arvāṃ iva śravase sātim acchendrasya vāyor abhi vītim arṣa |
GV01rv_hn09u:1781: RV_9,097.25c sa naḥ sahasrā bṛhatīr iṣo dā bhavā soma draviṇovit punānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1782: RV_9,097.26a devāvyo naḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ kṣayaṃ suvīraṃ dhanvantu somāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1783: RV_9,097.26c āyajyavaḥ sumatiṃ viśvavārā hotāro na diviyajo mandratamāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1784: RV_9,097.27a evā deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarase devapānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1785: RV_9,097.27c mahaś cid dhi ṣmasi hitāḥ samarye kṛdhi suṣṭhāne rodasī punānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1786: RV_9,097.28a aśvo no krado vṛṣabhir yujānaḥ siṃho na bhīmo manaso javīyān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1787: RV_9,097.28c arvācīnaiḥ pathibhir ye rajiṣṭhā ā pavasva saumanasaṃ na indo ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1788: RV_9,097.29a śataṃ dhārā devajātā asṛgran sahasram enāḥ kavayo mṛjanti |
GV01rv_hn09u:1789: RV_9,097.29c indo sanitraṃ diva ā pavasva puraetāsi mahato dhanasya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1790: RV_9,097.30a divo na sargā asasṛgram ahnāṃ rājā na mitram pra mināti dhīraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1791: RV_9,097.30c pitur na putraḥ kratubhir yatāna ā pavasva viśe asyā ajītim ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1792: RV_9,097.31a pra te dhārā madhumatīr asṛgran vārān yat pūto atyeṣy avyān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1793: RV_9,097.31c pavamāna pavase dhāma gonāṃ jajñānaḥ sūryam apinvo arkaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1794: RV_9,097.32a kanikradad anu panthām ṛtasya śukro vi bhāsy amṛtasya dhāma |
GV01rv_hn09u:1795: RV_9,097.32c sa indrāya pavase matsaravān hinvāno vācam matibhiḥ kavīnām ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1796: RV_9,097.33a divyaḥ suparṇo 'va cakṣi soma pinvan dhārāḥ karmaṇā devavītau |
GV01rv_hn09u:1797: RV_9,097.33c endo viśa kalaśaṃ somadhānaṃ krandann ihi sūryasyopa raśmim ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1798: RV_9,097.34a tisro vāca īrayati pra vahnir ṛtasya dhītim brahmaṇo manīṣām |
GV01rv_hn09u:1799: RV_9,097.34c gāvo yanti gopatim pṛcchamānāḥ somaṃ yanti matayo vāvaśānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1800: RV_9,097.35a somaṃ gāvo dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ somaṃ viprā matibhiḥ pṛcchamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1801: RV_9,097.35c somaḥ sutaḥ pūyate ajyamānaḥ some arkās triṣṭubhaḥ saṃ navante ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1802: RV_9,097.36a evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāna ā pavasva pūyamānaḥ svasti |
GV01rv_hn09u:1803: RV_9,097.36c indram ā viśa bṛhatā raveṇa vardhayā vācaṃ janayā purandhim ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1804: RV_9,097.37a ā jāgṛvir vipra ṛtā matīnāṃ somaḥ punāno asadac camūṣu |
GV01rv_hn09u:1805: RV_9,097.37c sapanti yam mithunāso nikāmā adhvaryavo rathirāsaḥ suhastāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1806: RV_9,097.38a sa punāna upa sūre na dhātobhe aprā rodasī vi ṣa āvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1807: RV_9,097.38c priyā cid yasya priyasāsa ūtī sa tū dhanaṃ kāriṇe na pra yaṃsat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1808: RV_9,097.39a sa vardhitā vardhanaḥ pūyamānaḥ somo mīḍhvāṃ abhi no jyotiṣāvīt |
GV01rv_hn09u:1809: RV_9,097.39c yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñāḥ svarvido abhi gā adrim uṣṇan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1810: RV_9,097.40a akrān samudraḥ prathame vidharmañ janayan prajā bhuvanasya rājā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1811: RV_9,097.40c vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avye bṛhat somo vāvṛdhe suvāna induḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1812: RV_9,097.41a mahat tat somo mahiṣaś cakārāpāṃ yad garbho 'vṛṇīta devān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1813: RV_9,097.41c adadhād indre pavamāna ojo 'janayat sūrye jyotir induḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1814: RV_9,097.42a matsi vāyum iṣṭaye rādhase ca matsi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1815: RV_9,097.42c matsi śardho mārutam matsi devān matsi dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1816: RV_9,097.43a ṛjuḥ pavasva vṛjinasya hantāpāmīvām bādhamāno mṛdhaś ca |
GV01rv_hn09u:1817: RV_9,097.43c abhiśrīṇan payaḥ payasābhi gonām indrasya tvaṃ tava vayaṃ sakhāyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1818: RV_9,097.44a madhvaḥ sūdam pavasva vasva utsaṃ vīraṃ ca na ā pavasvā bhagaṃ ca |
GV01rv_hn09u:1819: RV_9,097.44c svadasvendrāya pavamāna indo rayiṃ ca na ā pavasvā samudrāt ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1820: RV_9,097.45a somaḥ suto dhārayātyo na hitvā sindhur na nimnam abhi vājy akṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1821: RV_9,097.45c ā yoniṃ vanyam asadat punānaḥ sam indur gobhir asarat sam adbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1822: RV_9,097.46a eṣa sya te pavata indra somaś camūṣu dhīra uśate tavasvān |
GV01rv_hn09u:1823: RV_9,097.46c svarcakṣā rathiraḥ satyaśuṣmaḥ kāmo na yo devayatām asarji ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1824: RV_9,097.47a eṣa pratnena vayasā punānas tiro varpāṃsi duhitur dadhānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1825: RV_9,097.47c vasānaḥ śarma trivarūtham apsu hoteva yāti samaneṣu rebhan ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1826: RV_9,097.48a nū nas tvaṃ rathiro deva soma pari srava camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1827: RV_9,097.48c apsu svādiṣṭho madhumāṃ ṛtāvā devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1828: RV_9,097.49a abhi vāyuṃ vīty arṣā gṛṇāno 'bhi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1829: RV_9,097.49c abhī naraṃ dhījavanaṃ ratheṣṭhām abhīndraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhum ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1830: RV_9,097.50a abhi vastrā suvasanāny arṣābhi dhenūḥ sudughāḥ pūyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1831: RV_9,097.50c abhi candrā bhartave no hiraṇyābhy aśvān rathino deva soma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1832: RV_9,097.51a abhī no arṣa divyā vasūny abhi viśvā pārthivā pūyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1833: RV_9,097.51c abhi yena draviṇam aśnavāmābhy ārṣeyaṃ jamadagnivan naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1834: RV_9,097.52a ayā pavā pavasvainā vasūni māṃścatva indo sarasi pra dhanva |
GV01rv_hn09u:1835: RV_9,097.52c bradhnaś cid atra vāto na jūtaḥ purumedhaś cit takave naraṃ dāt ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1836: RV_9,097.53a uta na enā pavayā pavasvādhi śrute śravāyyasya tīrthe |
GV01rv_hn09u:1837: RV_9,097.53c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā naiguto vasūni vṛkṣaṃ na pakvaṃ dhūnavad raṇāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1838: RV_9,097.54a mahīme asya vṛṣanāma śūṣe māṃścatve vā pṛśane vā vadhatre |
GV01rv_hn09u:1839: RV_9,097.54c asvāpayan nigutaḥ snehayac cāpāmitrāṃ apācito acetaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1840: RV_9,097.55a saṃ trī pavitrā vitatāny eṣy anv ekaṃ dhāvasi pūyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1841: RV_9,097.55c asi bhago asi dātrasya dātāsi maghavā maghavadbhya indo ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1842: RV_9,097.56a eṣa viśvavit pavate manīṣī somo viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1843: RV_9,097.56c drapsāṃ īrayan vidatheṣv indur vi vāram avyaṃ samayāti yāti ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1844: RV_9,097.57a induṃ rihanti mahiṣā adabdhāḥ pade rebhanti kavayo na gṛdhrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1845: RV_9,097.57c hinvanti dhīrā daśabhiḥ kṣipābhiḥ sam añjate rūpam apāṃ rasena ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1846: RV_9,097.58a tvayā vayam pavamānena soma bhare kṛtaṃ vi cinuyāma śaśvat |
GV01rv_hn09u:1847: RV_9,097.58c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1848: RV_9,098.01a abhi no vājasātamaṃ rayim arṣa puruspṛham |
GV01rv_hn09u:1850: RV_9,098.02a pari ṣya suvāno avyayaṃ rathe na varmāvyata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1851: RV_9,098.02c indur abhi druṇā hito hiyāno dhārābhir akṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1852: RV_9,098.03a pari ṣya suvāno akṣā indur avye madacyutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1853: RV_9,098.03c dhārā ya ūrdhvo adhvare bhrājā naiti gavyayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1854: RV_9,098.04a sa hi tvaṃ deva śaśvate vasu martāya dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn09u:1855: RV_9,098.04c indo sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ śatātmānaṃ vivāsasi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1856: RV_9,098.05a vayaṃ te asya vṛtrahan vaso vasvaḥ puruspṛhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1857: RV_9,098.05c ni nediṣṭhatamā iṣaḥ syāma sumnasyādhrigo ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1858: RV_9,098.06a dvir yam pañca svayaśasaṃ svasāro adrisaṃhatam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1859: RV_9,098.06c priyam indrasya kāmyam prasnāpayanty ūrmiṇam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1860: RV_9,098.07a pari tyaṃ haryataṃ harim babhrum punanti vāreṇa |
GV01rv_hn09u:1861: RV_9,098.07c yo devān viśvāṃ it pari madena saha gacchati ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1862: RV_9,098.08a asya vo hy avasā pānto dakṣasādhanam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1863: RV_9,098.08c yaḥ sūriṣu śravo bṛhad dadhe svar ṇa haryataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1864: RV_9,098.09a sa vāṃ yajñeṣu mānavī indur janiṣṭa rodasī |
GV01rv_hn09u:1865: RV_9,098.09c devo devī giriṣṭhā asredhan taṃ tuviṣvaṇi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1866: RV_9,098.10a indrāya soma pātave vṛtraghne pari ṣicyase |
GV01rv_hn09u:1867: RV_9,098.10c nare ca dakṣiṇāvate devāya sadanāsade ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1868: RV_9,098.11a te pratnāso vyuṣṭiṣu somāḥ pavitre akṣaran |
GV01rv_hn09u:1869: RV_9,098.11c apaprothantaḥ sanutar huraścitaḥ prātas tāṃ apracetasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1870: RV_9,098.12a taṃ sakhāyaḥ purorucaṃ yūyaṃ vayaṃ ca sūrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1872: RV_9,099.01a ā haryatāya dhṛṣṇave dhanus tanvanti pauṃsyam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1873: RV_9,099.01c śukrāṃ vayanty asurāya nirṇijaṃ vipām agre mahīyuvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1874: RV_9,099.02a adha kṣapā pariṣkṛto vājāṃ abhi pra gāhate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1875: RV_9,099.02c yadī vivasvato dhiyo hariṃ hinvanti yātave ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1876: RV_9,099.03a tam asya marjayāmasi mado ya indrapātamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1877: RV_9,099.03c yaṃ gāva āsabhir dadhuḥ purā nūnaṃ ca sūrayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1878: RV_9,099.04a taṃ gāthayā purāṇyā punānam abhy anūṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1879: RV_9,099.04c uto kṛpanta dhītayo devānāṃ nāma bibhratīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1880: RV_9,099.05a tam ukṣamāṇam avyaye vāre punanti dharṇasim |
GV01rv_hn09u:1881: RV_9,099.05c dūtaṃ na pūrvacittaya ā śāsate manīṣiṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1882: RV_9,099.06a sa punāno madintamaḥ somaś camūṣu sīdati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1883: RV_9,099.06c paśau na reta ādadhat patir vacasyate dhiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1884: RV_9,099.07a sa mṛjyate sukarmabhir devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1885: RV_9,099.07c vide yad āsu saṃdadir mahīr apo vi gāhate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1886: RV_9,099.08a suta indo pavitra ā nṛbhir yato vi nīyase |
GV01rv_hn09u:1887: RV_9,099.08c indrāya matsarintamaś camūṣv ā ni ṣīdasi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1888: RV_9,100.01a abhī navante adruhaḥ priyam indrasya kāmyam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1889: RV_9,100.01c vatsaṃ na pūrva āyuni jātaṃ rihanti mātaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1890: RV_9,100.02a punāna indav ā bhara soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim |
GV01rv_hn09u:1891: RV_9,100.02c tvaṃ vasūni puṣyasi viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1892: RV_9,100.03a tvaṃ dhiyam manoyujaṃ sṛjā vṛṣṭiṃ na tanyatuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1893: RV_9,100.03c tvaṃ vasūni pārthivā divyā ca soma puṣyasi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1894: RV_9,100.04a pari te jigyuṣo yathā dhārā sutasya dhāvati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1895: RV_9,100.04c raṃhamāṇā vy avyayaṃ vāraṃ vājīva sānasiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1896: RV_9,100.05a kratve dakṣāya naḥ kave pavasva soma dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1897: RV_9,100.05c indrāya pātave suto mitrāya varuṇāya ca ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1898: RV_9,100.06a pavasva vājasātamaḥ pavitre dhārayā sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1899: RV_9,100.06c indrāya soma viṣṇave devebhyo madhumattamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1900: RV_9,100.07a tvāṃ rihanti mātaro harim pavitre adruhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1901: RV_9,100.07c vatsaṃ jātaṃ na dhenavaḥ pavamāna vidharmaṇi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1902: RV_9,100.08a pavamāna mahi śravaś citrebhir yāsi raśmibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1903: RV_9,100.08c śardhan tamāṃsi jighnase viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1904: RV_9,100.09a tvaṃ dyāṃ ca mahivrata pṛthivīṃ cāti jabhriṣe |
GV01rv_hn09u:1905: RV_9,100.09c prati drāpim amuñcathāḥ pavamāna mahitvanā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1906: RV_9,101.01a purojitī vo andhasaḥ sutāya mādayitnave |
GV01rv_hn09u:1907: RV_9,101.01c apa śvānaṃ śnathiṣṭana sakhāyo dīrghajihvyam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1908: RV_9,101.02a yo dhārayā pāvakayā pariprasyandate sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1910: RV_9,101.03a taṃ duroṣam abhī naraḥ somaṃ viśvācyā dhiyā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1912: RV_9,101.04a sutāso madhumattamāḥ somā indrāya mandinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1913: RV_9,101.04c pavitravanto akṣaran devān gacchantu vo madāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1914: RV_9,101.05a indur indrāya pavata iti devāso abruvan |
GV01rv_hn09u:1915: RV_9,101.05c vācas patir makhasyate viśvasyeśāna ojasā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1917: RV_9,101.06c somaḥ patī rayīṇāṃ sakhendrasya dive-dive ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1918: RV_9,101.07a ayam pūṣā rayir bhagaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1919: RV_9,101.07c patir viśvasya bhūmano vy akhyad rodasī ubhe ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1920: RV_9,101.08a sam u priyā anūṣata gāvo madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1921: RV_9,101.08c somāsaḥ kṛṇvate pathaḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1922: RV_9,101.09a ya ojiṣṭhas tam ā bhara pavamāna śravāyyam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1923: RV_9,101.09c yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīr abhi rayiṃ yena vanāmahai ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1925: RV_9,101.10c mitrāḥ suvānā arepasaḥ svādhyaḥ svarvidaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1926: RV_9,101.11a suṣvāṇāso vy adribhiś citānā gor adhi tvaci |
GV01rv_hn09u:1927: RV_9,101.11c iṣam asmabhyam abhitaḥ sam asvaran vasuvidaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1928: RV_9,101.12a ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1929: RV_9,101.12c sūryāso na darśatāso jigatnavo dhruvā ghṛte ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1930: RV_9,101.13a pra sunvānasyāndhaso marto na vṛta tad vacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1931: RV_9,101.13c apa śvānam arādhasaṃ hatā makhaṃ na bhṛgavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1932: RV_9,101.14a ā jāmir atke avyata bhuje na putra oṇyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1933: RV_9,101.14c saraj jāro na yoṣaṇāṃ varo na yonim āsadam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1934: RV_9,101.15a sa vīro dakṣasādhano vi yas tastambha rodasī |
GV01rv_hn09u:1935: RV_9,101.15c hariḥ pavitre avyata vedhā na yonim āsadam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1936: RV_9,101.16a avyo vārebhiḥ pavate somo gavye adhi tvaci |
GV01rv_hn09u:1937: RV_9,101.16c kanikradad vṛṣā harir indrasyābhy eti niṣkṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1938: RV_9,102.01a krāṇā śiśur mahīnāṃ hinvann ṛtasya dīdhitim |
GV01rv_hn09u:1939: RV_9,102.01c viśvā pari priyā bhuvad adha dvitā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1940: RV_9,102.02a upa tritasya pāṣyor abhakta yad guhā padam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1941: RV_9,102.02c yajñasya sapta dhāmabhir adha priyam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1942: RV_9,102.03a trīṇi tritasya dhārayā pṛṣṭheṣv erayā rayim |
GV01rv_hn09u:1943: RV_9,102.03c mimīte asya yojanā vi sukratuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1944: RV_9,102.04a jajñānaṃ sapta mātaro vedhām aśāsata śriye |
GV01rv_hn09u:1945: RV_9,102.04c ayaṃ dhruvo rayīṇāṃ ciketa yat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1946: RV_9,102.05a asya vrate sajoṣaso viśve devāso adruhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1947: RV_9,102.05c spārhā bhavanti rantayo juṣanta yat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1948: RV_9,102.06a yam ī garbham ṛtāvṛdho dṛśe cārum ajījanan |
GV01rv_hn09u:1950: RV_9,102.07a samīcīne abhi tmanā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā |
GV01rv_hn09u:1951: RV_9,102.07c tanvānā yajñam ānuṣag yad añjate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1952: RV_9,102.08a kratvā śukrebhir akṣabhir ṛṇor apa vrajaṃ divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1954: RV_9,103.01a pra punānāya vedhase somāya vaca udyatam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1955: RV_9,103.01c bhṛtiṃ na bharā matibhir jujoṣate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1956: RV_9,103.02a pari vārāṇy avyayā gobhir añjāno arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1957: RV_9,103.02c trī ṣadhasthā punānaḥ kṛṇute hariḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1958: RV_9,103.03a pari kośam madhuścutam avyaye vāre arṣati |
GV01rv_hn09u:1959: RV_9,103.03c abhi vāṇīr ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta nūṣata ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1960: RV_9,103.04a pari ṇetā matīnāṃ viśvadevo adābhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1961: RV_9,103.04c somaḥ punānaś camvor viśad dhariḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1962: RV_9,103.05a pari daivīr anu svadhā indreṇa yāhi saratham |
GV01rv_hn09u:1964: RV_9,103.06a pari saptir na vājayur devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1966: RV_9,104.01a sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata punānāya pra gāyata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1967: RV_9,104.01c śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ pari bhūṣata śriye ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1968: RV_9,104.02a sam ī vatsaṃ na mātṛbhiḥ sṛjatā gayasādhanam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1970: RV_9,104.03a punātā dakṣasādhanaṃ yathā śardhāya vītaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:1972: RV_9,104.04a asmabhyaṃ tvā vasuvidam abhi vāṇīr anūṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1973: RV_9,104.04c gobhiṣ ṭe varṇam abhi vāsayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1974: RV_9,104.05a sa no madānām pata indo devapsarā asi |
GV01rv_hn09u:1976: RV_9,104.06a sanemi kṛdhy asmad ā rakṣasaṃ kaṃ cid atriṇam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1977: RV_9,104.06c apādevaṃ dvayum aṃho yuyodhi naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1978: RV_9,105.01a taṃ vaḥ sakhāyo madāya punānam abhi gāyata |
GV01rv_hn09u:1979: RV_9,105.01c śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ svadayanta gūrtibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1980: RV_9,105.02a saṃ vatsa iva mātṛbhir indur hinvāno ajyate |
GV01rv_hn09u:1982: RV_9,105.03a ayaṃ dakṣāya sādhano 'yaṃ śardhāya vītaye |
GV01rv_hn09u:1984: RV_9,105.04a goman na indo aśvavat sutaḥ sudakṣa dhanva |
GV01rv_hn09u:1985: RV_9,105.04c śuciṃ te varṇam adhi goṣu dīdharam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1986: RV_9,105.05a sa no harīṇām pata indo devapsarastamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1987: RV_9,105.05c sakheva sakhye naryo ruce bhava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1988: RV_9,105.06a sanemi tvam asmad āṃ adevaṃ kaṃ cid atriṇam |
GV01rv_hn09u:1989: RV_9,105.06c sāhvāṃ indo pari bādho apa dvayum ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1990: RV_9,106.01a indram accha sutā ime vṛṣaṇaṃ yantu harayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1992: RV_9,106.02a ayam bharāya sānasir indrāya pavate sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:1993: RV_9,106.02c somo jaitrasya cetati yathā vide ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1994: RV_9,106.03a asyed indro madeṣv ā grābhaṃ gṛbhṇīta sānasim |
GV01rv_hn09u:1995: RV_9,106.03c vajraṃ ca vṛṣaṇam bharat sam apsujit ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1996: RV_9,106.04a pra dhanvā soma jāgṛvir indrāyendo pari srava |
GV01rv_hn09u:1997: RV_9,106.04c dyumantaṃ śuṣmam ā bharā svarvidam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:1998: RV_9,106.05a indrāya vṛṣaṇam madam pavasva viśvadarśataḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2002: RV_9,106.07a pavasva devavītaya indo dhārābhir ojasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:2003: RV_9,106.07c ā kalaśam madhumān soma naḥ sadaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2004: RV_9,106.08a tava drapsā udapruta indram madāya vāvṛdhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2005: RV_9,106.08c tvāṃ devāso amṛtāya kam papuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2006: RV_9,106.09a ā naḥ sutāsa indavaḥ punānā dhāvatā rayim |
GV01rv_hn09u:2008: RV_9,106.10a somaḥ punāna ūrmiṇāvyo vāraṃ vi dhāvati |
GV01rv_hn09u:2010: RV_9,106.11a dhībhir hinvanti vājinaṃ vane krīḷantam atyavim |
GV01rv_hn09u:2011: RV_9,106.11c abhi tripṛṣṭham matayaḥ sam asvaran ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2012: RV_9,106.12a asarji kalaśāṃ abhi mīḷhe saptir na vājayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2014: RV_9,106.13a pavate haryato harir ati hvarāṃsi raṃhyā |
GV01rv_hn09u:2016: RV_9,106.14a ayā pavasva devayur madhor dhārā asṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:2017: RV_9,106.14c rebhan pavitram pary eṣi viśvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2018: RV_9,107.01a parīto ṣiñcatā sutaṃ somo ya uttamaṃ haviḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2019: RV_9,107.01c dadhanvāṃ yo naryo apsv antar ā suṣāva somam adribhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2020: RV_9,107.02a nūnam punāno 'vibhiḥ pari sravādabdhaḥ surabhintaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2021: RV_9,107.02c sute cit tvāpsu madāmo andhasā śrīṇanto gobhir uttaram ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2022: RV_9,107.03a pari suvānaś cakṣase devamādanaḥ kratur indur vicakṣaṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2023: RV_9,107.04a punānaḥ soma dhārayāpo vasāno arṣasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:2024: RV_9,107.04c ā ratnadhā yonim ṛtasya sīdasy utso deva hiraṇyayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2025: RV_9,107.05a duhāna ūdhar divyam madhu priyam pratnaṃ sadhastham āsadat |
GV01rv_hn09u:2026: RV_9,107.05c āpṛcchyaṃ dharuṇaṃ vājy arṣati nṛbhir dhūto vicakṣaṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2027: RV_9,107.06a punānaḥ soma jāgṛvir avyo vāre pari priyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2028: RV_9,107.06c tvaṃ vipro abhavo 'ṅgirastamo madhvā yajñam mimikṣa naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2029: RV_9,107.07a somo mīḍhvān pavate gātuvittama ṛṣir vipro vicakṣaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2030: RV_9,107.07c tvaṃ kavir abhavo devavītama ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2031: RV_9,107.08a soma u ṣuvāṇaḥ sotṛbhir adhi ṣṇubhir avīnām |
GV01rv_hn09u:2032: RV_9,107.08c aśvayeva haritā yāti dhārayā mandrayā yāti dhārayā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2033: RV_9,107.09a anūpe gomān gobhir akṣāḥ somo dugdhābhir akṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2034: RV_9,107.09c samudraṃ na saṃvaraṇāny agman mandī madāya tośate ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2035: RV_9,107.10a ā soma suvāno adribhis tiro vārāṇy avyayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:2036: RV_9,107.10c jano na puri camvor viśad dhariḥ sado vaneṣu dadhiṣe ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2037: RV_9,107.11a sa māmṛje tiro aṇvāni meṣyo mīḷhe saptir na vājayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2038: RV_9,107.11c anumādyaḥ pavamāno manīṣibhiḥ somo viprebhir ṛkvabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2039: RV_9,107.12a pra soma devavītaye sindhur na pipye arṇasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:2040: RV_9,107.12c aṃśoḥ payasā madiro na jāgṛvir acchā kośam madhuścutam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2041: RV_9,107.13a ā haryato arjune atke avyata priyaḥ sūnur na marjyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2042: RV_9,107.13c tam īṃ hinvanty apaso yathā rathaṃ nadīṣv ā gabhastyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2043: RV_9,107.14a abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam |
GV01rv_hn09u:2044: RV_9,107.14c samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi manīṣiṇo matsarāsaḥ svarvidaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2045: RV_9,107.15a tarat samudram pavamāna ūrmiṇā rājā deva ṛtam bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn09u:2046: RV_9,107.15c arṣan mitrasya varuṇasya dharmaṇā pra hinvāna ṛtam bṛhat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2047: RV_9,107.16a nṛbhir yemāno haryato vicakṣaṇo rājā devaḥ samudriyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2048: RV_9,107.17a indrāya pavate madaḥ somo marutvate sutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2049: RV_9,107.17c sahasradhāro aty avyam arṣati tam ī mṛjanty āyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2050: RV_9,107.18a punānaś camū janayan matiṃ kaviḥ somo deveṣu raṇyati |
GV01rv_hn09u:2051: RV_9,107.18c apo vasānaḥ pari gobhir uttaraḥ sīdan vaneṣv avyata ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2052: RV_9,107.19a tavāhaṃ soma rāraṇa sakhya indo dive-dive |
GV01rv_hn09u:2053: RV_9,107.19c purūṇi babhro ni caranti mām ava paridhīṃr ati tāṃ ihi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2054: RV_9,107.20a utāhaṃ naktam uta soma te divā sakhyāya babhra ūdhani |
GV01rv_hn09u:2055: RV_9,107.20c ghṛṇā tapantam ati sūryam paraḥ śakunā iva paptima ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2056: RV_9,107.21a mṛjyamānaḥ suhastya samudre vācam invasi |
GV01rv_hn09u:2057: RV_9,107.21c rayim piśaṅgam bahulam puruspṛham pavamānābhy arṣasi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2058: RV_9,107.22a mṛjāno vāre pavamāno avyaye vṛṣāva cakrado vane |
GV01rv_hn09u:2059: RV_9,107.22c devānāṃ soma pavamāna niṣkṛtaṃ gobhir añjāno arṣasi ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2061: RV_9,107.23c tvaṃ samudram prathamo vi dhārayo devebhyaḥ soma matsaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2062: RV_9,107.24a sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ rajo divyā ca soma dharmabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2063: RV_9,107.24c tvāṃ viprāso matibhir vicakṣaṇa śubhraṃ hinvanti dhītibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2064: RV_9,107.25a pavamānā asṛkṣata pavitram ati dhārayā |
GV01rv_hn09u:2065: RV_9,107.25c marutvanto matsarā indriyā hayā medhām abhi prayāṃsi ca ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2066: RV_9,107.26a apo vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣatīndur hiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2067: RV_9,107.26c janayañ jyotir mandanā avīvaśad gāḥ kṛṇvāno na nirṇijam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2068: RV_9,108.01a pavasva madhumattama indrāya soma kratuvittamo madaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2070: RV_9,108.02a yasya te pītvā vṛṣabho vṛṣāyate 'sya pītā svarvidaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2071: RV_9,108.02c sa supraketo abhy akramīd iṣo 'cchā vājaṃ naitaśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2072: RV_9,108.03a tvaṃ hy aṅga daivyā pavamāna janimāni dyumattamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2074: RV_9,108.04a yenā navagvo dadhyaṅṅ aporṇute yena viprāsa āpire |
GV01rv_hn09u:2075: RV_9,108.04c devānāṃ sumne amṛtasya cāruṇo yena śravāṃsy ānaśuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2076: RV_9,108.05a eṣa sya dhārayā suto 'vyo vārebhiḥ pavate madintamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2078: RV_9,108.06a ya usriyā apyā antar aśmano nir gā akṛntad ojasā |
GV01rv_hn09u:2079: RV_9,108.06c abhi vrajaṃ tatniṣe gavyam aśvyaṃ varmīva dhṛṣṇav ā ruja ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2080: RV_9,108.07a ā sotā pari ṣiñcatāśvaṃ na stomam apturaṃ rajasturam |
GV01rv_hn09u:2082: RV_9,108.08a sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabham payovṛdham priyaṃ devāya janmane |
GV01rv_hn09u:2083: RV_9,108.08c ṛtena ya ṛtajāto vivāvṛdhe rājā deva ṛtam bṛhat ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2084: RV_9,108.09a abhi dyumnam bṛhad yaśa iṣas pate didīhi deva devayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2086: RV_9,108.10a ā vacyasva sudakṣa camvoḥ suto viśāṃ vahnir na viśpatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2087: RV_9,108.10c vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pavasva rītim apāṃ jinvā gaviṣṭaye dhiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2088: RV_9,108.11a etam u tyam madacyutaṃ sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ divo duhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2090: RV_9,108.12a vṛṣā vi jajñe janayann amartyaḥ pratapañ jyotiṣā tamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2091: RV_9,108.12c sa suṣṭutaḥ kavibhir nirṇijaṃ dadhe tridhātv asya daṃsasā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2092: RV_9,108.13a sa sunve yo vasūnāṃ yo rāyām ānetā ya iḷānām |
GV01rv_hn09u:2094: RV_9,108.14a yasya na indraḥ pibād yasya maruto yasya vāryamaṇā bhagaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2095: RV_9,108.14c ā yena mitrāvaruṇā karāmaha endram avase mahe ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2096: RV_9,108.15a indrāya soma pātave nṛbhir yataḥ svāyudho madintamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2098: RV_9,108.16a indrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa samudram iva sindhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2099: RV_9,108.16c juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave divo viṣṭambha uttamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2100: RV_9,109.01a pari pra dhanvendrāya soma svādur mitrāya pūṣṇe bhagāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2101: RV_9,109.02a indras te soma sutasya peyāḥ kratve dakṣāya viśve ca devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2102: RV_9,109.03a evāmṛtāya mahe kṣayāya sa śukro arṣa divyaḥ pīyūṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2103: RV_9,109.04a pavasva soma mahān samudraḥ pitā devānāṃ viśvābhi dhāma ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2104: RV_9,109.05a śukraḥ pavasva devebhyaḥ soma dive pṛthivyai śaṃ ca prajāyai ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2105: RV_9,109.06a divo dhartāsi śukraḥ pīyūṣaḥ satye vidharman vājī pavasva ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2106: RV_9,109.07a pavasva soma dyumnī sudhāro mahām avīnām anu pūrvyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2107: RV_9,109.08a nṛbhir yemāno jajñānaḥ pūtaḥ kṣarad viśvāni mandraḥ svarvit ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2108: RV_9,109.09a induḥ punānaḥ prajām urāṇaḥ karad viśvāni draviṇāni naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2109: RV_9,109.10a pavasva soma kratve dakṣāyāśvo na nikto vājī dhanāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2110: RV_9,109.11a taṃ te sotāro rasam madāya punanti somam mahe dyumnāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2111: RV_9,109.12a śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ harim mṛjanti pavitre somaṃ devebhya indum ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2112: RV_9,109.13a induḥ paviṣṭa cārur madāyāpām upasthe kavir bhagāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2113: RV_9,109.14a bibharti cārv indrasya nāma yena viśvāni vṛtrā jaghāna ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2114: RV_9,109.15a pibanty asya viśve devāso gobhiḥ śrītasya nṛbhiḥ sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2115: RV_9,109.16a pra suvāno akṣāḥ sahasradhāras tiraḥ pavitraṃ vi vāram avyam ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2116: RV_9,109.17a sa vājy akṣāḥ sahasraretā adbhir mṛjāno gobhiḥ śrīṇānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2117: RV_9,109.18a pra soma yāhīndrasya kukṣā nṛbhir yemāno adribhiḥ sutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2118: RV_9,109.19a asarji vājī tiraḥ pavitram indrāya somaḥ sahasradhāraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2119: RV_9,109.20a añjanty enam madhvo rasenendrāya vṛṣṇa indum madāya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2120: RV_9,109.21a devebhyas tvā vṛthā pājase 'po vasānaṃ harim mṛjanti ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2121: RV_9,109.22a indur indrāya tośate ni tośate śrīṇann ugro riṇann apaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2122: RV_9,110.01a pary ū ṣu pra dhanva vājasātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2123: RV_9,110.01c dviṣas taradhyā ṛṇayā na īyase ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2124: RV_9,110.02a anu hi tvā sutaṃ soma madāmasi mahe samaryarājye |
GV01rv_hn09u:2125: RV_9,110.02c vājāṃ abhi pavamāna pra gāhase ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2126: RV_9,110.03a ajījano hi pavamāna sūryaṃ vidhāre śakmanā payaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2128: RV_9,110.04a ajījano amṛta martyeṣv āṃ ṛtasya dharmann amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2130: RV_9,110.05a abhy-abhi hi śravasā tatardithotsaṃ na kaṃ cij janapānam akṣitam |
GV01rv_hn09u:2132: RV_9,110.06a ād īṃ ke cit paśyamānāsa āpyaṃ vasuruco divyā abhy anūṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:2133: RV_9,110.06c vāraṃ na devaḥ savitā vy ūrṇute ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2134: RV_9,110.07a tve soma prathamā vṛktabarhiṣo mahe vājāya śravase dhiyaṃ dadhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2135: RV_9,110.07c sa tvaṃ no vīra vīryāya codaya ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2136: RV_9,110.08a divaḥ pīyūṣam pūrvyaṃ yad ukthyam maho gāhād diva ā nir adhukṣata |
GV01rv_hn09u:2137: RV_9,110.08c indram abhi jāyamānaṃ sam asvaran ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2138: RV_9,110.09a adha yad ime pavamāna rodasī imā ca viśvā bhuvanābhi majmanā |
GV01rv_hn09u:2139: RV_9,110.09c yūthe na niṣṭhā vṛṣabho vi tiṣṭhase ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2140: RV_9,110.10a somaḥ punāno avyaye vāre śiśur na krīḷan pavamāno akṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2142: RV_9,110.11a eṣa punāno madhumāṃ ṛtāvendrāyenduḥ pavate svādur ūrmiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2144: RV_9,110.12a sa pavasva sahamānaḥ pṛtanyūn sedhan rakṣāṃsy apa durgahāṇi |
GV01rv_hn09u:2146: RV_9,111.01a ayā rucā hariṇyā punāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi tarati svayugvabhiḥ sūro na svayugvabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2147: RV_9,111.01d dhārā sutasya rocate punāno aruṣo hariḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2148: RV_9,111.01f viśvā yad rūpā pariyāty ṛkvabhiḥ saptāsyebhir ṛkvabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2149: RV_9,111.02a tvaṃ tyat paṇīnāṃ vido vasu sam mātṛbhir marjayasi sva ā dama ṛtasya dhītibhir dame |
GV01rv_hn09u:2150: RV_9,111.02d parāvato na sāma tad yatrā raṇanti dhītayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2151: RV_9,111.02f tridhātubhir aruṣībhir vayo dadhe rocamāno vayo dadhe ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2153: 111.03a pūrvām anu pradiśaṃ yāti cekitat saṃ raśmibhir yatate darśato ratho daivyo darśato rathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2154: RV_9,111.03d agmann ukthāni pauṃsyendraṃ jaitrāya harṣayan |
GV01rv_hn09u:2155: RV_9,111.03f vajraś ca yad bhavatho anapacyutā samatsv anapacyutā ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2156: RV_9,112.01a nānānaṃ vā u no dhiyo vi vratāni janānām |
GV01rv_hn09u:2157: RV_9,112.01c takṣā riṣṭaṃ rutam bhiṣag brahmā sunvantam icchatīndrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2159: RV_9,112.02c kārmāro aśmabhir dyubhir hiraṇyavantam icchatīndrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2160: RV_9,112.03a kārur ahaṃ tato bhiṣag upalaprakṣiṇī nanā |
GV01rv_hn09u:2161: RV_9,112.03c nānādhiyo vasūyavo 'nu gā iva tasthimendrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2162: RV_9,112.04a aśvo voḷhā sukhaṃ rathaṃ hasanām upamantriṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2163: RV_9,112.04c śepo romaṇvantau bhedau vār in maṇḍūka icchatīndrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2164: RV_9,113.01a śaryaṇāvati somam indraḥ pibatu vṛtrahā |
GV01rv_hn09u:2165: RV_9,113.01c balaṃ dadhāna ātmani kariṣyan vīryam mahad indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2166: RV_9,113.02a ā pavasva diśām pata ārjīkāt soma mīḍhvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2167: RV_9,113.02c ṛtavākena satyena śraddhayā tapasā suta indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2168: RV_9,113.03a parjanyavṛddham mahiṣaṃ taṃ sūryasya duhitābharat |
GV01rv_hn09u:2169: RV_9,113.03c taṃ gandharvāḥ praty agṛbhṇan taṃ some rasam ādadhur indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2170: RV_9,113.04a ṛtaṃ vadann ṛtadyumna satyaṃ vadan satyakarman |
GV01rv_hn09u:2171: RV_9,113.04c śraddhāṃ vadan soma rājan dhātrā soma pariṣkṛta indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2172: RV_9,113.05a satyamugrasya bṛhataḥ saṃ sravanti saṃsravāḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2173: RV_9,113.05c saṃ yanti rasino rasāḥ punāno brahmaṇā hara indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2174: RV_9,113.06a yatra brahmā pavamāna chandasyāṃ vācaṃ vadan |
GV01rv_hn09u:2175: RV_9,113.06c grāvṇā some mahīyate somenānandaṃ janayann indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2176: RV_9,113.07a yatra jyotir ajasraṃ yasmiṃl loke svar hitam |
GV01rv_hn09u:2177: RV_9,113.07c tasmin māṃ dhehi pavamānāmṛte loke akṣita indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2178: RV_9,113.08a yatra rājā vaivasvato yatrāvarodhanaṃ divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2179: RV_9,113.08c yatrāmūr yahvatīr āpas tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2180: RV_9,113.09a yatrānukāmaṃ caraṇaṃ trināke tridive divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2181: RV_9,113.09c lokā yatra jyotiṣmantas tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2182: RV_9,113.10a yatra kāmā nikāmāś ca yatra bradhnasya viṣṭapam |
GV01rv_hn09u:2183: RV_9,113.10c svadhā ca yatra tṛptiś ca tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2184: RV_9,113.11a yatrānandāś ca modāś ca mudaḥ pramuda āsate |
GV01rv_hn09u:2185: RV_9,113.11c kāmasya yatrāptāḥ kāmās tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2186: RV_9,114.01a ya indoḥ pavamānasyānu dhāmāny akramīt |
GV01rv_hn09u:2187: RV_9,114.01c tam āhuḥ suprajā iti yas te somāvidhan mana indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2188: RV_9,114.02a ṛṣe mantrakṛtāṃ stomaiḥ kaśyapodvardhayan giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2189: RV_9,114.02c somaṃ namasya rājānaṃ yo jajñe vīrudhām patir indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2190: RV_9,114.03a sapta diśo nānāsūryāḥ sapta hotāra ṛtvijaḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2191: RV_9,114.03c devā ādityā ye sapta tebhiḥ somābhi rakṣa na indrāyendo pari srava ||
GV01rv_hn09u:2192: RV_9,114.04a yat te rājañ chṛtaṃ havis tena somābhi rakṣa naḥ |
GV01rv_hn09u:2193: RV_9,114.04c arātīvā mā nas tārīn mo ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamad indrāyendo pari srava ||
